.sum-div{border:none;border-top:2px dashed var(--n3);margin:14px 0}
.sum-total{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;font-size:15px;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:16px;padding:12px 16px;background:linear-gradient(135deg,#e8faf7,#d0f5ee);border-radius:12px;border:1.5px solid rgba(13,115,119,.25);color:var(--g1)}
.nisab-box{border-radius:12px;padding:13px 15px;display:flex;gap:10px;align-items:flex-start;margin-bottom:18px;border:1px solid}
.nisab-box.pass{background:var(--tc-ibg,#c8f0ea);border-color:var(--tc-col,var(--g2))}
.nisab-box.fail{background:var(--n1);border-color:var(--n3)}
.nisab-box .nt{font-size:13px;font-weight:700}
.nisab-box .ns{font-size:11px;color:var(--n5);margin-top:2px}
.z-lbl{text-align:center;font-size:9px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:.16em;text-transform:uppercase;color:var(--g1);margin-bottom:6px;padding:5px 14px;background:linear-gradient(135deg,rgba(13,115,119,.08),rgba(20,160,133,.05));border-radius:50px;display:inline-block;width:auto;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}
.z-lbl-wrap{text-align:center;margin-bottom:4px}
.z-amt{text-align:center;font-family:var(--fs);font-size:52px;font-weight:900;line-height:1;margin-bottom:6px;letter-spacing:-2px}
.z-amt.teal{color:var(--g1)}.z-amt.gold{color:var(--t2)}.z-amt.indigo{color:var(--g1)}
.z-amt-wrap{background:linear-gradient(135deg,#e8faf7,#f0fdf9);border-radius:16px;padding:16px 12px 14px;margin-bottom:16px;border:1.5px solid rgba(13,115,119,.15);text-align:center}
@keyframes zpulse{0%,100%{transform:scale(1)}50%{transform:scale(1.05)}}
.zpulse{animation:zpulse .4s ease}
.calc-btn{display:flex;width:100%;align-items:center;justify-content:center;gap:8px;padding:14px;border-radius:12px;border:none;font-size:14px;font-weight:700;cursor:pointer;font-family:var(--fb);transition:.25s;color:#fff;margin-bottom:8px}
.calc-btn.teal{background:linear-gradient(135deg,var(--g1) 0%,#14a085 100%);box-shadow:0 4px 16px rgba(13,115,119,.32)}
.calc-btn.gold{background:var(--gold-grad);box-shadow:0 6px 18px rgba(192,38,211,.22)}.calc-btn.gold:hover{transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:0 12px 30px rgba(192,38,211,.35)}.calc-btn.gold:active{transform:translateY(0)}
.calc-btn.indigo{background:var(--indigo-grad)}.calc-btn.indigo:hover{transform:translateY(-2px)}.calc-btn.indigo:active{transform:translateY(0)}
.calc-btn.dark{background:var(--dark-grad)}.calc-btn.dark:hover{transform:translateY(-2px)}.calc-btn.dark:active{transform:translateY(0)}
.pdf-btn{width:100%;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;gap:8px;padding:13px;border-radius:11px;border:none;background:linear-gradient(135deg,var(--g1) 0%,#14a085 100%);font-size:13px;font-weight:700;cursor:pointer;font-family:var(--fb);color:#fff;transition:.25s;box-shadow:0 4px 16px rgba(13,115,119,.3)}
.pdf-btn:hover{transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:0 8px 24px rgba(13,115,119,.4);background:linear-gradient(135deg,#0a5f62 0%,#0d7377 100%)}
.pdf-btn:active{transform:translateY(0);box-shadow:0 2px 8px rgba(13,115,119,.3)}

/* ===== TOOLS SECTION ===== */
.tools-sec{padding:80px 24px;background:var(--n1)}
.tools-ctrl{max-width:1160px;margin:0 auto 24px;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;gap:10px;align-items:center}
.search-wrap{position:relative;flex:1;min-width:200px;max-width:300px}
.search-wrap svg{position:absolute;left:12px;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%);width:14px;height:14px;color:var(--n4)}
.tool-search{width:100%;padding:10px 13px 10px 34px;border:1.5px solid var(--n3);border-radius:10px;font-size:13px;font-family:var(--fb);background:#fff;outline:none;transition:.25s;box-shadow:var(--sh)}
.tool-search:focus{border-color:var(--g2);box-shadow:0 0 0 4px rgba(13,115,119,.08)}
.filter-tabs{display:flex;gap:5px;flex-wrap:wrap}
.fbtn{padding:7px 14px;border-radius:8px;border:1.5px solid var(--n3);background:#fff;font-size:10px;font-weight:700;cursor:pointer;font-family:var(--fb);color:var(--n6);transition:.25s;white-space:nowrap;letter-spacing:.04em}
.fbtn.active{background:var(--purple-grad);border-color:transparent;color:#fff;box-shadow:0 4px 14px rgba(13,115,119,.2)}
.fbtn:hover:not(.active){border-color:var(--g2);color:var(--g1);background:var(--g3)}
.fbtn:active{transform:scale(.97)}
.tools-grid{max-width:1160px;margin:0 auto;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(240px,1fr));gap:14px}

/* Tool card */
.tool-card{background:#fff;border-radius:var(--r2);padding:22px;border:1.5px solid var(--n3);transition:.25s;cursor:pointer;position:relative;overflow:hidden;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent}
.tool-card::before{content:'';position:absolute;top:0;left:0;right:0;height:3px;background:var(--tc-accent,var(--purple-grad));transition:.25s}
.tool-card:hover{border-color:transparent;box-shadow:0 12px 40px rgba(13,115,119,.15);transform:translateY(-4px)}
.tool-card:hover::before{height:5px}
.tool-card:active{transform:translateY(-1px);box-shadow:0 6px 20px rgba(13,115,119,.18)}
.tc-icon{width:44px;height:44px;background:var(--tc-ibg,var(--g3));border-radius:12px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin-bottom:12px;font-size:20px;transition:.25s}
.tool-card:hover .tc-icon{transform:scale(1.12) rotate(-3deg)}
.tc-cat{font-size:9px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:.14em;text-transform:uppercase;color:var(--tc-col,var(--g1));margin-bottom:5px}
.tool-card h4{font-size:13px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n9);margin-bottom:5px;line-height:1.35}
.tool-card p{font-size:11px;color:var(--n5);line-height:1.6;margin-bottom:14px}
.tc-link{font-size:11px;font-weight:700;color:var(--tc-col,var(--g1));display:flex;align-items:center;gap:3px}
.prem-badge{display:inline-block;background:#fef3c7;color:#d97706;font-size:9px;font-weight:800;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:.06em;padding:2px 7px;border-radius:50px;margin-left:5px}

/* Cat themes */
.tc-core{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#0d7377,#14a085);--tc-ibg:#c8f0ea;--tc-col:#0d7377;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#054446,#0d7377);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#0d7377,#14a085);--tc-lbl:#0d7377;--tc-row:#e8faf7;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#054446,#0d7377)}
.tc-nisab{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#b45309,#d97706);--tc-ibg:#fef3c7;--tc-col:#b45309;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#78350f,#b45309);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#b45309,#d97706);--tc-lbl:#92400e;--tc-row:#fef9ec;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#78350f,#b45309)}
.tc-haul{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#5b21b6,#7c3aed);--tc-ibg:#ede9fe;--tc-col:#5b21b6;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#2e1065,#5b21b6);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#5b21b6,#7c3aed);--tc-lbl:#5b21b6;--tc-row:#f5f3ff;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#2e1065,#5b21b6)}
.tc-business{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#0369a1,#0284c7);--tc-ibg:#e0f2fe;--tc-col:#0369a1;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#0c4a6e,#0369a1);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#0369a1,#0284c7);--tc-lbl:#0369a1;--tc-row:#f0f9ff;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#0c4a6e,#0369a1)}
.tc-crypto{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#3730a3,#4f46e5);--tc-ibg:#e0e7ff;--tc-col:#3730a3;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#1e1b4b,#3730a3);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#3730a3,#4f46e5);--tc-lbl:#3730a3;--tc-row:#eef2ff;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#1e1b4b,#3730a3)}
.tc-property{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#9f1239,#e11d48);--tc-ibg:#ffe4e6;--tc-col:#9f1239;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#4c0519,#9f1239);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#9f1239,#e11d48);--tc-lbl:#9f1239;--tc-row:#fff1f2;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#4c0519,#9f1239)}
.tc-family{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#9d174d,#be185d);--tc-ibg:#fce7f3;--tc-col:#9d174d;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#500724,#9d174d);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#9d174d,#be185d);--tc-lbl:#9d174d;--tc-row:#fdf2f8;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#500724,#9d174d)}
.tc-distribution{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#065f46,#059669);--tc-ibg:#d1fae5;--tc-col:#065f46;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#022c22,#065f46);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#065f46,#059669);--tc-lbl:#065f46;--tc-row:#ecfdf5;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#022c22,#065f46)}
.tc-advanced{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#c2410c,#ea580c);--tc-ibg:#ffedd5;--tc-col:#c2410c;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#7c2d12,#c2410c);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#c2410c,#ea580c);--tc-lbl:#c2410c;--tc-row:#fff7ed;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#7c2d12,#c2410c)}
.tc-logic{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#0e7490,#0891b2);--tc-ibg:#cffafe;--tc-col:#0e7490;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#083344,#0e7490);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#0e7490,#0891b2);--tc-lbl:#0e7490;--tc-row:#ecfeff;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#083344,#0e7490)}
.tc-reporting{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#334155,#475569);--tc-ibg:#f1f5f9;--tc-col:#334155;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#0f172a,#334155);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#334155,#475569);--tc-lbl:#334155;--tc-row:#f8fafc;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#0f172a,#334155)}
.tc-compliance{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#3f6212,#65a30d);--tc-ibg:#ecfccb;--tc-col:#3f6212;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#1a2e05,#3f6212);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#3f6212,#65a30d);--tc-lbl:#3f6212;--tc-row:#f7fee7;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#1a2e05,#3f6212)}
.tc-consumer{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#9f1239,#db2777);--tc-ibg:#fce7f3;--tc-col:#9f1239;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#500724,#9f1239);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#9f1239,#db2777);--tc-lbl:#9f1239;--tc-row:#fdf2f8;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#500724,#9f1239)}
.tc-institutional{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#0f172a,#1e293b);--tc-ibg:#e2e8f0;--tc-col:#1e293b;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#020617,#0f172a);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#0f172a,#1e293b);--tc-lbl:#1e293b;--tc-row:#f8fafc;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#020617,#0f172a)}
.tc-niche{--tc-accent:linear-gradient(135deg,#6b21a8,#9333ea);--tc-ibg:#f3e8ff;--tc-col:#6b21a8;--tc-hbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#3b0764,#6b21a8);--tc-htext:#fff;--tc-hsub:rgba(255,255,255,.65);--tc-btn:linear-gradient(135deg,#6b21a8,#9333ea);--tc-lbl:#6b21a8;--tc-row:#faf5ff;--tc-zbg:linear-gradient(135deg,#3b0764,#6b21a8)}

/* ── Modal calc-card inherits tool card category theme ── */
.modal .calc-card .calc-head{background:var(--tc-hbg,linear-gradient(135deg,#054446,#0d7377))}
.modal .calc-card .calc-head h3{color:var(--tc-htext,#fff)}
.modal .calc-card .calc-head p{color:var(--tc-hsub,rgba(255,255,255,.65))}
.modal .calc-card .calc-head .ch-icon{background:rgba(255,255,255,.15);color:var(--tc-htext,#fff)}
.modal .calc-card .sec-title{color:var(--tc-lbl,#0d7377)}
.modal .calc-card .sec-title::after{background:var(--tc-accent,#c2e8e3)}
.modal .calc-card .sum-total{background:var(--tc-row,#e8faf7);border-color:transparent;color:var(--tc-lbl,#0d7377)}
.modal .calc-card .zs-inp:focus{border-color:var(--tc-col,#0d7377);box-shadow:0 0 0 4px rgba(0,0,0,.06)}
.modal .calc-card .z-amt{color:var(--tc-lbl,#0d7377)}
.modal .calc-card .calc-btn.teal,.modal .calc-card .calc-btn.dark,.modal .calc-card .calc-btn.indigo,.modal .calc-card .calc-btn.gold{background:var(--tc-btn,linear-gradient(135deg,#0d7377,#14a085));color:#fff}
.modal .calc-card .pdf-btn{background:var(--tc-btn,linear-gradient(135deg,#0d7377,#14a085));color:#fff}
.modal .calc-card .info-box{border-left-color:var(--tc-col,#0d7377);background:var(--tc-row,#e8faf7)}
.modal .calc-card .info-box .ib-title{color:var(--tc-col,#0d7377)}
.modal .calc-card .nisab-box.pass{border-color:var(--tc-col,#0d7377)}
.modal .calc-card .live-hint{color:var(--tc-col,#0d7377)}
.modal .calc-card .inp-badge{background:var(--tc-ibg,#c8f0ea);color:var(--tc-lbl,#0d7377)}
.modal .calc-card .z-lbl{color:var(--tc-col,#0d7377);background:var(--tc-row,#e8faf7)}
.modal .calc-card .z-amt-wrap{background:var(--tc-row,#e8faf7);border-color:var(--tc-col,#0d7377)}
.modal .calc-card .sum-row{background:var(--tc-row,#e8faf7)}
.modal .calc-card .add-entry:hover,.modal .calc-card .add-tok:hover{border-color:var(--tc-col,#0d7377);color:var(--tc-col,#0d7377);background:var(--tc-ibg,#c8f0ea)}
.modal .calc-card .lc-item:hover{background:var(--tc-ibg,#c8f0ea);color:var(--tc-col,#0d7377)}

/* ===== BENEFITS ===== */
.ben-grid{max-width:1160px;margin:0 auto;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(300px,1fr));gap:20px}
.ben-card{background:#fff;border-radius:20px;padding:30px;border:1.5px solid var(--n2);transition:.3s;position:relative;overflow:hidden}
.ben-card::after{content:'';position:absolute;bottom:-40px;right:-40px;width:100px;height:100px;border-radius:50%;background:var(--g3);opacity:.5;transition:.3s}
.ben-card:hover{transform:translateY(-4px);box-shadow:var(--sh2);border-color:var(--g3)}
.ben-card:hover::after{transform:scale(1.5)}
.ben-icon{width:52px;height:52px;background:var(--g3);border-radius:14px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin-bottom:18px;font-size:22px;position:relative;z-index:1}
.ben-card h3{font-family:var(--fs);font-size:18px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n9);margin-bottom:8px;position:relative;z-index:1}
.ben-card p{font-size:13px;color:var(--n5);line-height:1.75;position:relative;z-index:1}

/* ===== STEPS ===== */
.steps{max-width:960px;margin:0 auto;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(200px,1fr));gap:0;position:relative}
.steps::before{content:'';position:absolute;top:34px;left:12%;right:12%;height:2px;background:linear-gradient(90deg,var(--g3),var(--g2),var(--g3))}
.step{text-align:center;padding:0 16px}
.step-num{width:68px;height:68px;border-radius:50%;background:#fff;border:3px solid var(--g2);display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin:0 auto 18px;font-family:var(--fs);font-size:26px;font-weight:800;color:var(--g1);position:relative;z-index:1;box-shadow:0 8px 24px rgba(6,95,70,.16)}
.step h4{font-size:14px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n9);margin-bottom:6px;font-family:var(--fs)}
.step p{font-size:12px;color:var(--n5);line-height:1.7}

/* ===== NISAB SECTION ===== */
.nisab-sec{background:linear-gradient(135deg,#071a18,#1a4a44);padding:72px 24px;position:relative;overflow:hidden}
.nisab-sec::before{content:'';position:absolute;top:-80px;right:-100px;width:360px;height:360px;border-radius:50%;background:radial-gradient(circle,rgba(180,83,9,.2) 0%,transparent 70%)}
.nisab-cards{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:18px;max-width:540px;margin:36px auto 28px}
.nisab-card{background:rgba(255,255,255,.05);backdrop-filter:blur(12px);border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.1);border-radius:20px;padding:28px;text-align:center;transition:.3s}
.nisab-card:hover{background:rgba(217,119,6,.08);border-color:rgba(217,119,6,.3);transform:translateY(-3px)}
.nc-icon{font-size:30px;margin-bottom:8px}
.nc-lbl{font-size:9px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:.16em;text-transform:uppercase;color:rgba(255,255,255,.35);margin-bottom:7px}
.nc-val{font-family:var(--fs);font-size:32px;font-weight:800;color:#fbbf24;letter-spacing:-1px}
.nc-sub{font-size:11px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.3);margin-top:5px}

/* ===== ABOUT ===== */
.about-inner{max-width:1160px;margin:0 auto;display:flex;gap:64px;flex-wrap:wrap;align-items:center}
.about-text{flex:1;min-width:280px}
.about-text h2{font-family:var(--fs);font-size:clamp(24px,4vw,42px);font-weight:800;color:var(--n9);line-height:1.12;margin-bottom:14px}
.about-text p{font-size:14px;color:var(--n5);line-height:1.85;margin-bottom:14px}
.about-stats{flex:1;min-width:280px;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:16px}
.astat{background:var(--g4);border-radius:16px;padding:26px;text-align:center;border:1px solid var(--g3)}
.astat-num{font-family:var(--fs);font-size:38px;font-weight:800;color:var(--g1);line-height:1;letter-spacing:-1px}
.astat-lbl{font-size:10px;color:var(--n5);margin-top:5px;font-weight:600}

/* ===== FAQ ===== */
.faq-list{max-width:800px;margin:44px auto 0}
.faq-item{background:#fff;border-radius:14px;margin-bottom:10px;border:1.5px solid var(--n2);overflow:hidden;transition:.25s}
.faq-item:hover{border-color:var(--g3)}
.faq-item.open{border-color:var(--g2);box-shadow:0 6px 24px rgba(13,115,119,.08)}
.faq-q{width:100%;padding:20px 22px;background:none;border:none;text-align:left;font-size:14px;font-weight:600;color:var(--n9);cursor:pointer;font-family:var(--fb);display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;gap:10px;transition:.2s}
.faq-q:hover{color:var(--g1)}
.faq-ico{width:26px;height:26px;flex-shrink:0;background:var(--n1);border-radius:50%;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:18px;font-weight:300;color:var(--n7);transition:.3s}
.faq-item.open .faq-ico{transform:rotate(45deg);background:var(--g2);color:#fff}
.faq-a{max-height:0;overflow:hidden;transition:max-height .4s ease}
.faq-item.open .faq-a{max-height:400px}
.faq-a-inner{padding:0 22px 20px;font-size:13px;color:var(--n7);line-height:1.85;border-top:1px solid var(--n2);padding-top:14px}

/* ===== TRUST ===== */
.trust-grid{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;gap:12px;justify-content:center;margin-top:32px}
.trust-badge{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:8px;background:#fff;border:1.5px solid var(--g3);border-radius:11px;padding:12px 18px;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n9);box-shadow:var(--sh);transition:.2s}
.trust-badge:hover{border-color:var(--g2);transform:translateY(-2px)}

/* ===== NEWSLETTER ===== */
.nl-sec{background:linear-gradient(135deg,#071a18,#1a4a44);padding:80px 24px;text-align:center;position:relative;overflow:hidden}
.nl-sec h2{font-family:var(--fs);font-size:clamp(24px,4.5vw,46px);font-weight:800;color:#fff;margin-bottom:10px;position:relative;z-index:1}
.nl-sec p{color:rgba(255,255,255,.45);font-size:15px;margin-bottom:30px;position:relative;z-index:1}
.nl-form{display:flex;gap:8px;max-width:440px;margin:0 auto;position:relative;z-index:1}
.nl-form input{flex:1;padding:14px 18px;border-radius:11px;border:1.5px solid rgba(255,255,255,.15);font-size:13px;font-family:var(--fb);background:rgba(255,255,255,.08);color:#fff;outline:none;transition:.25s}
.nl-form input:focus{border-color:#fbbf24;background:rgba(255,255,255,.12)}
.nl-form input::placeholder{color:rgba(255,255,255,.3)}
.nl-form button{background:var(--purple-grad);color:#fff;border:none;padding:14px 22px;border-radius:11px;font-size:13px;font-weight:700;cursor:pointer;font-family:var(--fb);transition:.25s;white-space:nowrap}
.nl-form button:hover{transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:0 8px 24px rgba(13,115,119,.3)}
.nl-form button:active{transform:translateY(0)}
.nl-note{margin-top:12px;font-size:10px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.28);position:relative;z-index:1}

/* ===== FOOTER ===== */
.footer{background:#071a18;padding:60px 24px 28px}
.footer-inner{max-width:1160px;margin:0 auto}
.footer-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1.8fr 1fr 1fr 1fr;gap:40px 32px;margin-bottom:44px;align-items:start}
.footer-brand p{font-size:12px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.3);line-height:1.9;margin-top:14px}
.fc h4{font-size:9px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:.18em;text-transform:uppercase;color:rgba(255,255,255,.3);margin-bottom:18px}
.fc ul{list-style:none}
.fc ul li{margin-bottom:10px}
.fc ul li a{color:rgba(255,255,255,.4);text-decoration:none;font-size:12px;font-weight:500;transition:.2s}
.fc ul li a:hover{color:var(--gold2)}
.footer-bottom{border-top:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.05);padding-top:22px;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;gap:10px}
.footer-bottom p{font-size:11px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.22)}
.footer-links{display:flex;gap:20px}
.footer-links a{font-size:11px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.22);text-decoration:none;transition:.2s}
.footer-links a:hover{color:#fff}

/* ===== MODAL ===== */
.modal-overlay{display:none;position:fixed;inset:0;background:rgba(12,10,9,.65);z-index:2000;align-items:flex-start;justify-content:center;padding:20px;overflow-y:auto;backdrop-filter:blur(6px);-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch}
.modal-overlay.open{display:flex}
.modal{background:#fff;border-radius:24px;width:100%;max-width:980px;margin:auto;overflow:hidden;box-shadow:0 40px 100px rgba(12,10,9,.3)}
.modal-top{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;padding:16px 24px;border-bottom:1px solid var(--n2);background:var(--n1)}
.modal-back{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:7px;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n5);background:#fff;border:1.5px solid var(--n3);border-radius:9px;padding:8px 14px;cursor:pointer;font-family:var(--fb);transition:.25s}
.modal-back:hover{border-color:var(--g2);color:var(--g1);background:var(--g3)}
.modal-title{font-size:13px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n9);font-family:var(--fs)}
.modal-close{width:34px;height:34px;border-radius:50%;background:#fff;border:1.5px solid var(--n3);cursor:pointer;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;transition:.2s}
.modal-close:hover{background:#fee2e2;border-color:#fca5a5}
.modal-close svg{width:14px;height:14px;stroke:var(--n7)}
.modal-close:hover svg{stroke:var(--rose)}
.modal-body{padding:24px}
.modal-curr-wrap{position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:8px}
.modal-curr-trigger{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:5px;padding:6px 12px;border-radius:10px;border:1.5px solid var(--n3);background:#fff;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n8);cursor:pointer;transition:.2s;user-select:none;white-space:nowrap}
.modal-curr-trigger:hover{border-color:var(--g2);color:var(--g1);background:var(--g4)}
.modal-curr-trigger.open{border-color:var(--g2);color:var(--g1);background:var(--g4)}
#modal-curr-arrow{transition:transform .2s;flex-shrink:0}
.modal-curr-trigger.open #modal-curr-arrow{transform:rotate(180deg)}
.modal-curr-drop{display:none;position:absolute;top:calc(100% + 6px);right:0;width:230px;background:#fff;border:1.5px solid var(--n2);border-radius:14px;box-shadow:0 12px 40px rgba(13,115,119,.18);z-index:9999;overflow:hidden}
.modal-curr-drop.open{display:block}
.mcd-search-wrap{padding:10px 10px 6px}
.mcd-search{width:100%;padding:7px 12px;border:1.5px solid var(--n3);border-radius:8px;font-size:12px;font-family:var(--fb);outline:none;color:var(--n8)}
.mcd-search:focus{border-color:var(--g2)}
.mcd-list{max-height:260px;overflow-y:auto;padding:4px 0 8px}
.mcd-item{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:8px;padding:8px 14px;cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;font-weight:600;color:var(--n7);transition:.15s}
.mcd-item:hover{background:var(--g4);color:var(--g1)}
.mcd-item.active{background:var(--g3);color:var(--g1);font-weight:700}
.mcd-item .mcd-flag{font-size:15px;flex-shrink:0}
.mcd-item .mcd-name{font-size:10px;color:var(--n5);margin-left:auto}

/* Token cards */
.tok-card{background:var(--n1);border:1.5px solid var(--n3);border-radius:13px;padding:14px;margin-bottom:10px;transition:.2s}
.tok-card:hover{border-color:var(--g2);box-shadow:0 4px 14px rgba(180,83,9,.08)}
.tok-head{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;margin-bottom:10px;gap:8px}
.tok-sym{font-size:13px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n9);background:none;border:none;outline:none;width:80px;font-family:var(--fb)}
.tok-price-lbl{font-size:11px;color:var(--n5)}
.tok-price-lbl input{background:none;border:none;outline:none;font-size:11px;width:80px;color:var(--n5);font-family:var(--fb)}
.tok-val{text-align:right;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;color:var(--g1);margin-top:6px}
.add-tok{width:100%;padding:12px;border:2px dashed var(--n3);border-radius:11px;background:none;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n5);cursor:pointer;font-family:var(--fb);transition:.2s;margin-top:4px}
.add-tok:hover{border-color:var(--g2);color:var(--g2);background:var(--g3)}
.info-box{background:#fff;border:1.5px solid var(--g3);border-radius:12px;padding:13px 15px;margin-bottom:14px;border-left:3px solid var(--g2)}
.ib-title{font-size:9px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:.12em;text-transform:uppercase;color:var(--g1);margin-bottom:5px}
.info-box p{font-size:12px;color:var(--n5);line-height:1.65}

/* Entry rows */
.entry-row{margin-bottom:12px;background:var(--n1);border-radius:11px;padding:13px;border:1.5px solid transparent;transition:.2s}
.entry-row:hover{border-color:var(--n3)}
.entry-head{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;margin-bottom:7px}
.entry-name{font-size:13px;font-weight:600;color:var(--n7);background:transparent;border:none;outline:none;font-family:var(--fb);width:calc(100% - 28px)}
.del-btn{background:none;border:none;cursor:pointer;width:26px;height:26px;border-radius:50%;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;color:var(--n3);transition:.2s;font-size:14px}
.del-btn:hover{background:#fee2e2;color:var(--rose)}
.add-entry{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;gap:6px;width:100%;padding:11px;border:2px dashed var(--n3);border-radius:10px;background:none;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n5);cursor:pointer;font-family:var(--fb);transition:.2s;margin-top:6px}
.add-entry:hover{border-color:var(--g2);color:var(--g1);background:var(--g4)}


/* ============================================================
   FULL RESPONSIVE SYSTEM
   Breakpoints:
   1280px+ = large desktop
   1024px  = desktop/laptop
   900px   = tablet landscape
   768px   = tablet portrait
   640px   = large mobile
   480px   = mobile
   360px   = small mobile
   ============================================================ */

/* ── DESKTOP 1024px ── */
@media(max-width:1024px){
  .nav-inner{padding:0 20px}
  .nav-links{gap:20px}
  .hero{padding:64px 20px 80px}
  .sec{padding:64px 20px}
  .tools-sec{padding:64px 20px}
  .about-inner{gap:40px}
  .footer-grid{grid-template-columns:1.5fr 1fr 1fr 1fr;gap:32px 24px}
  .calc-card{max-width:100%}
  .tools-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(220px,1fr))}
}

/* ── TABLET LANDSCAPE 900px ── */
@media(max-width:900px){
  /* Navbar */
  .nav-links,.nav-right{display:none}
  .mob-btn{display:block}
  .nav-inner{padding:0 16px;height:60px}
  .logo-name{font-size:18px}

  /* Hero */
  .hero{padding:56px 20px 72px}
  .hero-stats{flex-direction:column}
  .hstat{border-right:none;border-bottom:1px solid var(--n2);padding:18px 20px}
  .hstat:last-child{border-bottom:none}
  .hero-btns{flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:center}

  /* Calc */
  .calc-body{flex-direction:column}
  .calc-l{border-right:none;border-bottom:1px solid var(--n2);min-width:unset;width:100%}
  .calc-r{min-width:unset;width:100%}
  .calc-head{padding:20px 24px}

  /* Steps */
  .steps{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:32px 0}
  .steps::before{display:none}

  /* Footer */
  .footer-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr;gap:32px 20px}
  .footer-brand{grid-column:1/-1}
  .footer{padding:48px 20px 24px}

  /* Nisab */
  .nisab-cards{max-width:100%}
  .nisab-sec{padding:56px 20px}

  /* Misc */
  .about-inner{flex-direction:column;gap:40px}
  .about-stats{grid-template-columns:repeat(4,1fr)}
  .tools-ctrl{gap:8px}
  .prices-inner{gap:8px}
  .sec{padding:56px 20px}
  .tools-sec{padding:56px 20px}

  /* Modal */
  .modal{border-radius:20px;margin:12px auto}
  .modal-overlay{padding:12px}
}

/* ── TABLET PORTRAIT 768px ── */
@media(max-width:768px){
  /* Hero */
  .hero h1{font-size:clamp(32px,8vw,52px)}
  .hero-sub{font-size:15px}
  .btn-primary,.btn-secondary{padding:13px 24px;font-size:14px}

  /* Prices bar */
  .prices-bar{padding:8px 16px;overflow-x:auto}
  .prices-inner{flex-wrap:nowrap;justify-content:flex-start;overflow-x:auto;padding-bottom:4px;gap:8px;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch}
  .price-pill{flex-shrink:0}
  .prices-refresh{display:none}

  /* Tools */
  .tools-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(200px,1fr));gap:12px}
  .tools-ctrl{flex-direction:column;align-items:stretch}
  .search-wrap{max-width:100%}
  .filter-tabs{overflow-x:auto;flex-wrap:nowrap;padding-bottom:4px;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch;scrollbar-width:none}
  .filter-tabs::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}
  .fbtn{flex-shrink:0}

  /* Benefits */
  .ben-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:14px}

  /* Steps */
  .steps{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:28px}

  /* Nisab */
  .nisab-cards{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:14px}

  /* About stats */
  .about-stats{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:12px}

  /* Calc */
  .calc-l,.calc-r{padding:22px 20px}
  .calc-head{padding:18px 20px}
  .calc-head h3{font-size:17px}
  .z-amt{font-size:44px}

  /* Footer */
  .footer-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:28px 20px}
  .footer-brand{grid-column:1/-1}
  .footer-bottom{flex-direction:column;text-align:center;gap:8px}
  .footer-links{justify-content:center;flex-wrap:wrap;gap:14px}

  /* Modal */
  .modal{border-radius:16px}
  .modal-body{padding:18px}
  .modal .calc-body{flex-direction:column}
  .modal .calc-l{border-right:none;border-bottom:1px solid var(--n2)}
  .modal .calc-r{background:#fafcfc}
  .modal-curr-drop{right:auto;left:0}

  /* Currency banner */
  .curr-banner{padding:8px 12px;gap:8px}
  .curr-pills{gap:5px}
  .cpill{padding:3px 10px;font-size:10px}
}

/* ── LARGE MOBILE 640px ── */
@media(max-width:640px){
  /* Ticker */
  .ticker-label{padding:0 12px;font-size:9px}
  .ticker-item{padding:0 14px}

  /* Navbar */
  .logo-sub{display:none}
  .logo-name{font-size:17px}
  .logo-icon{width:36px;height:36px;border-radius:10px}

  /* Hero */
  .hero{padding:44px 16px 60px}
  .hero::before,.hero::after{display:none}
  .hero-badge{font-size:9px;padding:7px 14px}
  .hero-stats{margin-top:40px}
  .hstat{padding:16px 16px}
  .hstat-num{font-size:24px}

  /* Calculator */
  .calc-card{border-radius:20px;margin:0 0px}
  .calc-head{padding:16px 18px;gap:10px}
  .calc-head h3{font-size:16px}
  .calc-l,.calc-r{padding:18px 16px}
  .z-amt{font-size:40px;letter-spacing:-1px}
  .z-amt-wrap{padding:14px 10px}
  .sum-row{padding:8px 11px;font-size:13px}
  .sum-total{padding:10px 13px;font-size:14px}

  /* Tools */
  .tools-sec{padding:44px 16px}
  .tools-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(160px,1fr));gap:10px}
  .tool-card{padding:18px 16px;border-radius:16px}
  .tc-icon{width:38px;height:38px;font-size:18px}
  .tool-card h4{font-size:12px}
  .tool-card p{font-size:11px;margin-bottom:10px}

  /* Sections */
  .sec{padding:44px 16px}
  .sec-hdr{margin-bottom:36px}
  .sec-hdr h2{font-size:clamp(22px,7vw,34px)}

  /* Benefits */
  .ben-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr;gap:12px}
  .ben-card{padding:22px 20px;border-radius:16px}

  /* Steps */
  .steps{grid-template-columns:1fr;gap:20px;max-width:340px}
  .step-num{width:56px;height:56px;font-size:22px}

  /* Nisab */
  .nisab-sec{padding:44px 16px}
  .nisab-cards{gap:12px}
  .nc-val{font-size:26px}

  /* About */
  .astat{padding:20px 16px}
  .astat-num{font-size:30px}
  .about-stats{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:10px}

  /* FAQ */
  .faq-list{margin-top:28px}
  .faq-q{padding:16px 18px;font-size:13px}
  .faq-a-inner{padding:12px 18px 16px;font-size:12px}

  /* Newsletter */
  .nl-sec{padding:56px 16px}
  .nl-form{flex-direction:column;gap:10px;max-width:100%}
  .nl-form input,.nl-form button{border-radius:10px;width:100%}

  /* Footer */
  .footer{padding:40px 16px 20px}
  .footer-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:24px 16px}
  .footer-brand{grid-column:1/-1}
  .footer-brand p{font-size:11px}

  /* Prices bar */
  .prices-bar{padding:8px 12px}

  /* Currency banner */
  .curr-banner{padding:7px 12px;gap:6px}
  .curr-banner-label{display:none}

  /* Modal */
  .modal-overlay{padding:0;align-items:flex-end}
  .modal{border-radius:24px 24px 0 0;max-height:92vh;overflow-y:auto;margin:0}
  .modal-top{padding:14px 18px}
  .modal-back{padding:7px 12px;font-size:11px}
  .modal-title{font-size:12px}
  .modal-body{padding:16px}

  /* LC Panel */
  .lc-panel{width:calc(100vw - 32px);right:-8px}
}

/* ── MOBILE 480px ── */
@media(max-width:480px){
  /* Ticker */
  .ticker-wrap{height:34px}
  .ticker-label{padding:0 10px;gap:5px}
  .ticker-item{padding:0 12px;font-size:10px;gap:6px}

  /* Hero */
  .hero{padding:36px 14px 52px}
  .hero h1{font-size:clamp(28px,9vw,42px);letter-spacing:-.5px}
  .hero-badge{margin-bottom:20px}
  .hero-btns{gap:8px}
  .btn-primary,.btn-secondary{padding:12px 20px;font-size:13px;border-radius:10px}

  /* Calculator */
  .calc-card{border-radius:16px}
  .calc-head{padding:14px 16px;flex-wrap:wrap;gap:10px}
  .ch-icon{width:40px;height:40px;font-size:18px;border-radius:10px}
  .calc-head h3{font-size:14px}
  .calc-l,.calc-r{padding:16px 14px}
  .zs-inp{font-size:13px;padding:11px 11px 11px 40px}
  .inp-pre{width:36px;font-size:11px}
  .z-amt{font-size:36px}
  .z-lbl{font-size:8px;padding:4px 12px}
  .calc-btn{padding:12px;font-size:12px;border-radius:10px}
  .pdf-btn{padding:12px;font-size:12px;border-radius:10px}

  /* Tools */
  .tools-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:8px}
  .tool-card{padding:14px 12px;border-radius:14px}
  .tc-icon{width:34px;height:34px;font-size:16px;border-radius:10px;margin-bottom:9px}
  .tool-card h4{font-size:11px;margin-bottom:4px}
  .tool-card p{font-size:10px;display:none}
  .tc-link{display:none}

  /* Sections */
  .sec{padding:36px 14px}
  .sec-hdr{margin-bottom:28px}
  .tools-sec{padding:36px 14px}

  /* Steps */
  .steps{max-width:280px}

  /* Nisab cards */
  .nisab-cards{grid-template-columns:1fr;max-width:280px;gap:10px}

  /* Footer */
  .footer-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr}
  .fc{border-top:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.06);padding-top:16px}
  .footer-bottom{gap:6px}

  /* LC Panel */
  .lc-panel{width:calc(100vw - 24px);right:-4px;max-height:70vh;overflow-y:auto}
  .lc-btn{padding:7px 11px;font-size:11px}

  /* Curr banner */
  .curr-banner{gap:5px;flex-wrap:nowrap;overflow-x:auto;justify-content:flex-start;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch}
  .curr-banner::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}
  .curr-pills{flex-wrap:nowrap}

  /* Modal */
  .modal-body .calc-l,.modal-body .calc-r{padding:14px 12px}
  .modal-curr-wrap{display:none}
  .modal-top{flex-wrap:wrap;gap:8px;padding:12px 14px}
}

/* ── SMALL MOBILE 360px ── */
@media(max-width:360px){
  .hero h1{font-size:26px}
  .hero{padding:30px 12px 44px}
  .calc-l,.calc-r{padding:14px 12px}
  .calc-head{padding:12px 14px}
  .calc-head h3{font-size:13px}
  .zs-inp{padding:10px 10px 10px 36px;font-size:12px}
  .z-amt{font-size:30px}
  .tools-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:6px}
  .tool-card{padding:12px 10px}
  .tc-icon{width:30px;height:30px;font-size:14px}
  .tool-card h4{font-size:10px}
  .sec{padding:30px 12px}
  .tools-sec{padding:30px 12px}
  .btn-primary,.btn-secondary{padding:11px 16px;font-size:12px}
  .hstat-num{font-size:20px}
  .nl-sec{padding:44px 12px}
  .footer{padding:32px 12px 16px}
  .footer-grid{gap:18px}
  .lc-panel{width:calc(100vw - 16px);right:0px}
}

/* ── LANDSCAPE PHONE FIX ── */
@media(max-height:500px) and (orientation:landscape){
  .hero{padding:32px 20px 40px}
  .hero-stats{display:none}
  .modal-overlay{align-items:flex-start;padding:8px}
  .modal{max-height:96vh}
  .ticker-wrap{display:none}
}

/* ── LARGE SCREEN 1400px+ ── */
@media(min-width:1400px){
  .nav-inner,.prices-inner,.tools-ctrl,.tools-grid,.ben-grid,.about-inner,.footer-inner{max-width:1360px}
  .calc-card{max-width:1060px}
  .sec-hdr h2{font-size:52px}
  .hero h1{font-size:80px}
  .hero-sub{font-size:19px}
}

/* ── PRINT STYLES ── */
@media print{
  .ticker-wrap,.zs-nav,.curr-banner,.prices-bar,.tools-sec,.ben-grid,
  .steps,.nl-sec,.footer,.ad-wrap,.modal-overlay,.lc-panel,.mob-btn{display:none!important}
  .hero{padding:24px;background:#fff}
  .calc-card{box-shadow:none;border:1px solid #ccc}
  body{color:#000}
}

/* ── CROSS-BROWSER FIXES ── */
/* Firefox */
@-moz-document url-prefix(){
  .zs-inp{padding:13px 13px 13px 46px}
  .curr-sel{padding:8px 26px 8px 11px}
  .filter-tabs{scrollbar-width:none}
}
/* Safari / iOS */
@supports(-webkit-touch-callout:none){
  .zs-nav{position:sticky;top:0;-webkit-position:sticky}
  .modal-overlay{-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch}
  .prices-inner{-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch}
  .filter-tabs{-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch}
}

/* Touch device optimizations */
@media(hover:none) and (pointer:coarse){
  .tool-card:hover{transform:none;box-shadow:0 4px 16px rgba(13,115,119,.1)}
  .tool-card:active{transform:scale(.97);box-shadow:0 2px 10px rgba(13,115,119,.15)}
  .calc-btn,.pdf-btn,.btn-primary,.btn-secondary{-webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent;min-height:48px}
  .zs-inp,.zs-sel{min-height:48px;font-size:16px}/* Prevent zoom on iOS */
  .faq-q{min-height:48px}
  .lc-btn,.lc-item,.cpill,.fbtn,.mcd-item{min-height:44px;display:flex;align-items:center}
  .nav-links a:hover::after{width:0}
}

/* High DPI / Retina screens */
@media(-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio:2),(min-resolution:192dpi){
  .logo-icon{box-shadow:0 4px 16px rgba(13,115,119,.25)}
  ::-webkit-scrollbar{width:4px}
}

/* Dark mode support */
@media(prefers-color-scheme:dark){
  /* Only applied if user hasn't set explicit theme */
}

/* Reduced motion */
@media(prefers-reduced-motion:reduce){
  *{animation-duration:.01ms!important;animation-iteration-count:1!important;transition-duration:.01ms!important}
  .ticker-track{animation:none}
  .tool-card:hover{transform:none}
}

[id]{scroll-margin-top:80px}
@media(max-width:900px){[id]{scroll-margin-top:68px}}
@media(max-width:480px){[id]{scroll-margin-top:60px}}

/* ===== LANGUAGE + CURRENCY SWITCHER ===== */
.lc-switcher{position:relative}
.lc-btn{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:6px;background:var(--n1);border:1.5px solid var(--n3);border-radius:10px;padding:8px 13px;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n9);cursor:pointer;font-family:var(--fb);transition:.25s;white-space:nowrap}
.lc-btn:hover{border-color:var(--g2);background:#fff;color:var(--g1)}
.lc-btn #lc-lang-lbl{background:var(--g3);color:var(--g1);padding:1px 7px;border-radius:50px;font-size:10px;font-weight:800}
.lc-panel{display:none;position:absolute;top:calc(100% + 8px);right:0;width:340px;background:#fff;border:1.5px solid var(--n2);border-radius:16px;box-shadow:0 20px 60px rgba(0,0,0,.15);z-index:9999;overflow:hidden}
.lc-panel.open{display:block;animation:lcFadeIn .18s ease}
@keyframes lcFadeIn{from{opacity:0;transform:translateY(-6px)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}}
.lc-tabs{display:flex;border-bottom:1.5px solid var(--n2);background:var(--n1)}
.lc-tab{flex:1;padding:11px;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n5);background:none;border:none;cursor:pointer;font-family:var(--fb);transition:.2s;border-bottom:2px solid transparent}
.lc-tab.active{color:var(--g1);border-bottom-color:var(--g2);background:#fff}
.lc-tab:hover:not(.active){color:var(--n7)}
.lc-search-wrap{padding:10px 12px 6px}
.lc-search{width:100%;padding:8px 12px;border:1.5px solid var(--n3);border-radius:9px;font-size:12px;font-family:var(--fb);outline:none;transition:.2s}
.lc-search:focus{border-color:var(--g2)}
.lc-list{max-height:260px;overflow-y:auto;padding:6px 8px 10px}
.lc-list::-webkit-scrollbar{width:4px}.lc-list::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:var(--n3);border-radius:2px}
.lc-item{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:10px;padding:9px 10px;border-radius:9px;cursor:pointer;transition:.18s;font-size:13px;font-weight:500;color:var(--n7)}
.lc-item:hover{background:var(--g3);color:var(--g1)}
.lc-item.active{background:var(--g3);color:var(--g1);font-weight:700}
.lc-item .lc-flag{font-size:18px;flex-shrink:0;width:26px;text-align:center}
.lc-item .lc-name{flex:1;line-height:1.3}
.lc-item .lc-name small{display:block;font-size:10px;color:var(--n4);font-weight:500}
.lc-item .lc-code{font-size:11px;font-weight:700;color:var(--n4);background:var(--n2);padding:2px 7px;border-radius:50px;flex-shrink:0}
.lc-item.active .lc-code{background:var(--g2);color:#fff}
.lc-group-label{font-size:9px;font-weight:800;letter-spacing:.12em;text-transform:uppercase;color:var(--n4);padding:8px 10px 4px;margin-top:4px}
/* RTL support for Arabic/Urdu */
body.rtl{direction:rtl;text-align:right}
body.rtl .nav-inner{flex-direction:row-reverse}
body.rtl .logo{flex-direction:row-reverse}
body.rtl .lc-panel{right:auto;left:0}
body.rtl .calc-l{border-right:none;border-left:1px solid var(--n2)}
body.rtl .inp-pre{left:auto;right:0;justify-content:flex-start;padding-right:0;padding-left:8px}
body.rtl .zs-inp{padding:13px 46px 13px 13px}
body.rtl .zs-inp.no-pre{padding:13px}
body.rtl .inp-suf{right:auto;left:0}
body.rtl .lc-panel{right:auto;left:0}
body.rtl .modal-curr-drop{right:auto;left:0}
body.rtl .sec-title::after{margin-left:0;margin-right:8px}
body.rtl .filter-tabs{direction:rtl}
@media(max-width:640px){
  body.rtl .lc-panel{right:auto;left:-8px}
}

.radio-grp{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:8px;margin-top:4px}
.radio-opt{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:8px;font-size:12px;font-weight:600;color:var(--n7);cursor:pointer;padding:8px 12px;border:1.5px solid var(--n3);border-radius:10px;transition:.15s}
.radio-opt:hover{border-color:var(--tc-col,var(--g2));background:var(--tc-row,var(--g4));color:var(--tc-lbl,var(--g1))}
.radio-opt input[type=radio]{accent-color:var(--g2);width:15px;height:15px;flex-shrink:0}
.radio-opt input[type=radio]:checked + *,.radio-opt:has(input:checked){border-color:var(--tc-col,var(--g2));background:var(--tc-row,var(--g4));color:var(--tc-lbl,var(--g1))}
.entry-head{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:8px;margin-bottom:6px}
.entry-name{flex:1;border:1.5px solid var(--n3);border-radius:8px;padding:5px 10px;font-size:12px;font-weight:600;font-family:var(--fb);color:var(--n8);outline:none}
.entry-name:focus{border-color:var(--g2)}

/* ===== DONATE BUTTON ===== */
.donate-wrap{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:8px;background:linear-gradient(135deg,#fff8e6,#fef3c7);border:1.5px solid #fcd34d;border-radius:12px;padding:8px 14px 8px 10px;cursor:pointer;transition:.25s;text-decoration:none;white-space:nowrap;position:relative;overflow:hidden}
.donate-wrap::before{content:'';position:absolute;inset:0;background:linear-gradient(135deg,#fef9c3,#fde68a);opacity:0;transition:.25s}
.donate-wrap:hover{transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:0 6px 20px rgba(217,119,6,.25);border-color:#f59e0b}
.donate-wrap:hover::before{opacity:1}
.donate-wrap:active{transform:translateY(0)}
.donate-heart{font-size:18px;position:relative;z-index:1;animation:heartbeat 2s ease-in-out infinite}
@keyframes heartbeat{0%,100%{transform:scale(1)}15%{transform:scale(1.2)}30%{transform:scale(1)}}
.donate-text{position:relative;z-index:1;line-height:1.25}
.donate-text-top{font-size:11px;font-weight:800;color:#92400e;letter-spacing:.02em;display:block}
.donate-text-sub{font-size:9px;font-weight:600;color:#b45309;opacity:.8;display:block}
.donate-pp{position:relative;z-index:1;width:52px;flex-shrink:0}
.donate-pp img{width:100%;display:block}

/* Navbar donate — compact */
.nav-donate{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:7px;background:linear-gradient(135deg,#fffbeb,#fef3c7);border:1.5px solid #fcd34d;border-radius:10px;padding:5px 10px 5px 10px;cursor:pointer;transition:.25s;text-decoration:none;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden}
.nav-donate:hover{transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:0 4px 14px rgba(217,119,6,.3);border-color:#f59e0b}
.nav-donate:active{transform:translateY(0)}
.nav-donate .dh{font-size:15px;animation:heartbeat 2s ease-in-out infinite;flex-shrink:0}
.nav-donate img{height:32px;display:block;border-radius:5px}

/* Tool donate button (below PDF) */
.tool-donate-wrap{width:100%;margin-top:10px;border-radius:14px;overflow:hidden;border:2px solid #fcd34d;background:linear-gradient(135deg,#fffbeb 0%,#fef3c7 50%,#fde68a 100%);transition:.3s;position:relative;box-shadow:0 3px 12px rgba(217,119,6,.12)}
.tool-donate-wrap::before{content:'';position:absolute;inset:0;background:radial-gradient(ellipse at 70% 50%,rgba(251,191,36,.25) 0%,transparent 70%);pointer-events:none}
.tool-donate-wrap:hover{border-color:#f59e0b;box-shadow:0 6px 24px rgba(217,119,6,.28);transform:translateY(-2px)}
.tool-donate-wrap:active{transform:translateY(0)}
.tool-donate-inner{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:12px;padding:12px 16px;text-decoration:none}
.tool-donate-icon{font-size:22px;animation:heartbeat 2s ease-in-out infinite;flex-shrink:0;filter:drop-shadow(0 2px 4px rgba(217,119,6,.3))}
.tool-donate-text{flex:1;min-width:0}
.tool-donate-text strong{display:block;font-size:12px;font-weight:800;color:#78350f;letter-spacing:-.01em}
.tool-donate-text span{font-size:10px;color:#b45309;font-weight:500;display:block;margin-top:1px}
.tool-donate-pp{flex-shrink:0;position:relative;z-index:1}
.tool-donate-pp img{height:44px;display:block;border-radius:8px;box-shadow:0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,.15);transition:.2s}
.tool-donate-wrap:hover .tool-donate-pp img{transform:scale(1.04);box-shadow:0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,.2)}
#pp-nav-btn,#pp-adv-btn{display:none}

/* Mobile hide donate in nav */
@media(max-width:900px){.nav-donate{display:none}}
/* Responsive tool donate */
@media(max-width:480px){.tool-donate-text span{display:none}}


/* ===== ARTICLE SECTION ===== */
.art-sec{padding:72px 24px}
.art-inner{max-width:1160px;margin:0 auto;display:flex;gap:48px;align-items:flex-start}
.art-content{flex:1;min-width:0}
.art-sidebar{width:300px;flex-shrink:0;position:sticky;top:90px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:20px}

/* Article body typography */
.art-body{font-size:15px;line-height:1.85;color:var(--n7)}
.art-h2{font-family:var(--fs);font-size:22px;font-weight:800;color:var(--n9);margin:36px 0 12px;display:flex;align-items:center;gap:10px;padding-bottom:10px;border-bottom:2px solid var(--n2)}
.art-num{width:32px;height:32px;background:var(--teal-grad);color:#fff;border-radius:8px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:14px;font-weight:800;flex-shrink:0}
.art-h3{font-family:var(--fs);font-size:17px;font-weight:700;color:var(--g1);margin:24px 0 8px}
.art-p{margin-bottom:14px;color:var(--n7)}
.art-ul{padding-left:0;list-style:none;margin:0 0 16px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:6px}
.art-ul li{display:flex;align-items:flex-start;gap:8px;font-size:14px;color:var(--n7);padding:8px 12px;background:var(--n1);border-radius:8px;border-left:3px solid var(--g2);line-height:1.6}
.art-ul li::before{content:"\2713";color:var(--g1);font-weight:800;flex-shrink:0;margin-top:1px}
.art-highlights{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:12px;margin:20px 0}
.art-hl-card{background:linear-gradient(135deg,var(--g3),#e0faf6);border:1.5px solid var(--g3);border-radius:12px;padding:16px;border-left:4px solid var(--g1)}
.art-hl-card strong{display:block;font-size:12px;font-weight:800;color:var(--g1);margin-bottom:4px;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:.04em}
.art-hl-card span{font-size:12px;color:var(--n6);line-height:1.5}

/* Sidebar cards */
.art-cert-card{background:#fff;border-radius:16px;overflow:hidden;border:1.5px solid var(--n2);box-shadow:0 4px 20px rgba(13,115,119,.08)}
.art-cert-img-wrap{overflow:hidden;border-radius:14px 14px 0 0;max-height:200px}
.art-cert-img{width:100%;height:200px;object-fit:cover;object-position:center top;display:block;transition:.3s}
.art-cert-card:hover .art-cert-img{transform:scale(1.03)}
.art-cert-badge{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:10px;padding:12px 14px;background:linear-gradient(135deg,#054446,#0d7377)}
.art-cert-badge .art-cert-icon{font-size:20px;flex-shrink:0}
.art-cert-badge strong{display:block;font-size:11px;font-weight:800;color:#fff}
.art-cert-badge span{display:block;font-size:9px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.7);margin-top:2px}

.art-toc{background:#fff;border:1.5px solid var(--n2);border-radius:14px;padding:18px;box-shadow:0 2px 12px rgba(13,115,119,.06)}
.art-toc-title{font-size:12px;font-weight:800;color:var(--n9);letter-spacing:.06em;text-transform:uppercase;margin-bottom:12px;display:flex;align-items:center;gap:6px}
.art-toc-list{padding-left:16px;margin:0;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:5px}
.art-toc-list li{font-size:12px}
.art-toc-list a{color:var(--g1);text-decoration:none;font-weight:500;transition:.15s;line-height:1.5}
.art-toc-list a:hover{color:var(--n9);text-decoration:underline}

.art-stats-card{background:linear-gradient(135deg,#054446,#0d7377);border-radius:14px;padding:18px;box-shadow:0 6px 20px rgba(13,115,119,.25)}
.art-stats-title{font-size:11px;font-weight:800;color:rgba(255,255,255,.6);letter-spacing:.1em;text-transform:uppercase;margin-bottom:14px}
.art-stat{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;padding:7px 0;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08)}
.art-stat:last-of-type{border-bottom:none}
.art-stat-n{font-family:var(--fs);font-size:22px;font-weight:800;color:#fff}
.art-stat-l{font-size:11px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.55);font-weight:500}
.art-cta-btn{display:block;margin-top:14px;background:linear-gradient(135deg,#d97706,#f59e0b);color:#fff;text-align:center;padding:12px;border-radius:10px;font-size:13px;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none;transition:.2s;box-shadow:0 4px 12px rgba(217,119,6,.3)}
.art-cta-btn:hover{transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:0 8px 20px rgba(217,119,6,.4)}

.art-donate-card{background:linear-gradient(135deg,#fffbeb,#fef3c7);border:2px solid #fcd34d;border-radius:14px;padding:18px;text-align:center}
.art-donate-top{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:10px;margin-bottom:14px;text-align:left}
.art-donate-top strong{display:block;font-size:13px;font-weight:800;color:#78350f}
.art-donate-top span{display:block;font-size:10px;color:#b45309;margin-top:2px}
.art-donate-btn{display:block;transition:.2s}
.art-donate-btn:hover{transform:scale(1.03)}

/* Responsive */
@media(max-width:1024px){
  .art-sidebar{width:260px}
}
@media(max-width:768px){
  .art-inner{flex-direction:column}
  .art-sidebar{width:100%;position:static}
  .art-highlights{grid-template-columns:1fr}
  .art-sec{padding:44px 16px}
}
@media(max-width:480px){
  .art-h2{font-size:18px}
  .art-h3{font-size:15px}
  .art-body{font-size:14px}
}

<h2 class="art-h2"><span class="art-num">2</span>Why Accurate Zakat Calculation Matters</h2>

<p class="art-p">Modern Muslims hold wealth in shares, cryptocurrency, business assets, rental properties, pension funds, and digital wallets — each governed by distinct Shariah rules. An incorrect calculation may result in paying too little (leaving an obligation unfulfilled) or too much (unnecessary financial burden). ZakatSuite eliminates this confusion by providing dedicated, Shariah-compliant calculators for every asset type, following AAOIFI guidelines and contemporary scholarly consensus.</p>

<h2 class="art-h2"><span class="art-num">6</span>Zakat on Different Asset Types</h2>
<h3 class="art-h3">🥇 Zakat on Gold</h3>
<p class="art-p">If you hold 85 grams or more of gold for a full lunar year (Haul), Zakat of 2.5% of the current market value is due. ZakatSuite&#x27;s Gold Zakat Calculator fetches the live gold price in your currency and calculates your obligation instantly — supporting pure gold, 22K, 18K, and mixed alloy jewelry.</p>
<h3 class="art-h3">🥈 Zakat on Silver</h3>
<p class="art-p">Silver Nisab is 595 grams. Because silver is priced lower than gold, the Silver Nisab threshold in currency terms is significantly lower, meaning more Muslims are included in the obligation. Many scholars prefer using the Silver Nisab standard. ZakatSuite&#x27;s Silver Calculator auto-fills the live silver price.</p>
<h3 class="art-h3">₿ Zakat on Cryptocurrency</h3>
<p class="art-p">According to the majority of contemporary Islamic scholars and AAOIFI standards, Zakat is due on cryptocurrency held as a tradeable asset when it has been held above the Nisab for a full Haul. ZakatSuite&#x27;s Crypto Calculator supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, BNB, and major tokens with live prices. Stablecoins (USDT, USDC) are treated as cash equivalents. DeFi, staking rewards, and NFTs also have dedicated calculators.</p>
<h3 class="art-h3">🏢 Zakat on Business</h3>
<p class="art-p">Business Zakat applies to trade inventory, cash, and collectible receivables — while fixed assets (machinery, buildings) and confirmed payables are deducted. ZakatSuite provides dedicated tools for sole traders, SMEs, e-commerce sellers, partnerships, and corporations, all following AAOIFI Standard No. 35.</p>
<h3 class="art-h3">📈 Zakat on Stocks &amp; Mutual Funds</h3>
<p class="art-p">Stock Zakat depends on whether shares are held for active trading or long-term investment. Trading shares: Zakat on current market value. Long-term investment shares: Zakat on the company&#x27;s Zakatable assets proportional to your holding. ZakatSuite&#x27;s Stock Portfolio Calculator handles both methods, along with dedicated tools for Mutual Funds, REITs, and ETFs.</p>
<h3 class="art-h3">🏠 Zakat on Property</h3>
<p class="art-p">Only property purchased for resale is Zakatable at its current market value. Property held as a personal residence or long-term investment is not directly Zakatable, though rental income from it may be. ZakatSuite covers all scenarios: rental income, property-for-sale, REIT units, and mortgage deductions.</p>

var ACT_LANG = 'en'; // active language

// ===== FORMAT HELPERS =====
function getSym(){return CURR[ACT].sym;}
function getRate(){return CURR[ACT].rate;}

function fmtC(n){
  // Format number with currency — NO merge, always "SYM AMOUNT"
  if(isNaN(n)||n===null||n===undefined) return getSym()+' 0.00';
  var s = getSym();
  var absN = Math.abs(n);
  var formatted;
  if(absN>=1000000) formatted = (absN/1000000).toFixed(2)+'M';
  else if(absN>=1000) formatted = absN.toLocaleString('en-US',{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2});
  else formatted = absN.toFixed(2);
  return s+' '+formatted;
}

function fmtCLarge(n){
  if(isNaN(n)) return getSym()+' 0';
  var s = getSym();
  var absN = Math.abs(n);
  var formatted;
  if(absN>=1000000000) formatted = (absN/1000000000).toFixed(1)+'B';
  else if(absN>=1000000) formatted = (absN/1000000).toFixed(1)+'M';
  else if(absN>=1000) formatted = absN.toLocaleString('en-US',{maximumFractionDigits:0});
  else formatted = absN.toFixed(0);
  return s+' '+formatted;
}

function fmtPrice(n, sym){
  // For ticker/price display
  if(!n) return '--';
  if(n>=1000) return sym+(n).toLocaleString('en-US',{maximumFractionDigits:0});
  if(n>=1) return sym+n.toFixed(2);
  return sym+n.toFixed(4);
}

function pct(n){
  if(!n&&n!==0) return '';
  var p = n.toFixed(2);
  return (n>=0?'+':'')+p+'%';
}

function pulse(el){if(el){el.classList.add('zpulse');setTimeout(function(){el.classList.remove('zpulse');},500);}}

// ===== FETCH LIVE PRICES =====
function fetchPrices(){
  // CoinGecko free API — no key needed
  var url = 'https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/markets?vs_currency=usd&ids=bitcoin,ethereum,binancecoin,solana,ripple&order=market_cap_desc&per_page=10&page=1&sparkline=false&price_change_percentage=24h';
  
  fetch(url)
  .then(function(r){return r.json();})
  .then(function(data){
    data.forEach(function(coin){
      if(coin.id==='bitcoin'){LIVE.btc=coin.current_price;updateTicker('btc',coin.current_price,coin.price_change_percentage_24h);}
      if(coin.id==='ethereum'){LIVE.eth=coin.current_price;updateTicker('eth',coin.current_price,coin.price_change_percentage_24h);}
      if(coin.id==='binancecoin'){LIVE.bnb=coin.current_price;updateTicker('bnb',coin.current_price,coin.price_change_percentage_24h);}
      if(coin.id==='solana'){LIVE.sol=coin.current_price;updateTicker('sol',coin.current_price,coin.price_change_percentage_24h);}
      if(coin.id==='ripple'){LIVE.xrp=coin.current_price;updateTicker('xrp',coin.current_price,coin.price_change_percentage_24h);}
    });
    updatePricePills();
    updateAdvHints();
    lastFetch = Date.now();
    document.getElementById('last-updated').textContent = 'Updated: '+new Date().toLocaleTimeString();
  })
  .catch(function(){
    // Fallback values if API fails
    if(!LIVE.btc){LIVE.btc=95000;LIVE.eth=2800;LIVE.bnb=580;LIVE.sol=150;LIVE.xrp=0.52;}
    updatePricePills();
  });

  // Metals via free metals API (Metals.live or fallback)
  fetch('https://api.metals.live/v1/spot/gold,silver')
  .then(function(r){return r.json();})
  .then(function(data){
    if(data&&data[0]){
      // Response is price per troy oz
      var goldOz = data[0].price || 3100;
      var silverOz = (data[1]&&data[1].price) || 34;
      LIVE.goldUSD = goldOz / 31.1035; // convert oz to gram
      LIVE.silverUSD = silverOz / 31.1035;
    }
    updateMetals();
    updateNisabLive();
  })
  .catch(function(){
    // Fallback metals
    if(!LIVE.goldUSD){LIVE.goldUSD=3100/31.1035;LIVE.silverUSD=34/31.1035;}
    updateMetals();
    updateNisabLive();
  });
}

function updateTicker(id, price, chg){
  var sym = '$';
  var p = fmtPrice(price, sym);
  var c = pct(chg);
  var cls = chg>=0 ? 'ticker-item' : 'ticker-item';
  var chgCls = chg>=0 ? 't-up' : 't-down';
  
  // Update both copies for loop
  [id, id+'2'].forEach(function(elId){
    var pe = document.getElementById('tk-'+elId);
    var ce = document.getElementById('tk-'+elId+'-c');
    if(pe) pe.textContent = p;
    if(ce){ ce.textContent = c; ce.className = chgCls; }
  });
  
  // Update price pill
  var ppEl = document.getElementById('pp-'+id);
  var ppChg = document.getElementById('pp-'+id+'-c');
  if(ppEl) ppEl.textContent = fmtPrice(price*getRate(), getSym());
  if(ppChg){
    ppChg.textContent = pct(chg);
    ppChg.className = 'pp-chg '+(chg>=0?'pp-up':'pp-down');
  }
}

function updateMetals(){
  var rate = getRate();
  var goldG = LIVE.goldUSD * rate;
  var silverG = LIVE.silverUSD * rate;
  
  // Price pills
  var ppGold = document.getElementById('pp-gold');
  var ppSilver = document.getElementById('pp-silver');
  if(ppGold) ppGold.textContent = fmtPrice(goldG, getSym());
  if(ppSilver) ppSilver.textContent = fmtPrice(silverG, getSym());
  
  // Ticker
  ['gold','gold2'].forEach(function(id){
    var el = document.getElementById('tk-'+id);
    if(el) el.textContent = fmtPrice(LIVE.goldUSD*31.1035, '$');
  });
  ['silver','silver2'].forEach(function(id){
    var el = document.getElementById('tk-'+id);
    if(el) el.textContent = fmtPrice(LIVE.silverUSD*31.1035, '$');
  });
  
  updateAdvHints();
}

function updatePricePills(){
  var rate = getRate();
  var sym = getSym();
  
  // Update crypto price pills with converted currency
  var cryptos = {btc:'pp-btc',eth:'pp-eth',bnb:'pp-bnb'};
  Object.keys(cryptos).forEach(function(k){
    var el = document.getElementById(cryptos[k]);
    if(el&&LIVE[k]) el.textContent = fmtPrice(LIVE[k]*rate, sym);
  });
}

function updateAdvHints(){
  var rate = getRate();
  var sym = getSym();
  var gh = document.getElementById('adv-gold-hint');
  var sh = document.getElementById('adv-silver-hint');
  if(gh&&LIVE.goldUSD) gh.textContent = 'Gold: '+sym+' '+(LIVE.goldUSD*rate).toFixed(2)+'/gram (live)';
  if(sh&&LIVE.silverUSD) sh.textContent = 'Silver: '+sym+' '+(LIVE.silverUSD*rate).toFixed(2)+'/gram (live)';
}

function updateNisabLive(){
  var rate = getRate();
  var goldNisab = LIVE.goldUSD ? (LIVE.goldUSD * 85 * rate) : CURR[ACT].nisabG;
  var silverNisab = LIVE.silverUSD ? (LIVE.silverUSD * 595 * rate) : CURR[ACT].nisabS;
  
  // Update CURR rates with live values
  CURR[ACT].nisabG = goldNisab;
  CURR[ACT].nisabS = silverNisab;
  
  var gv = document.getElementById('nc-gold');
  var sv = document.getElementById('nc-silver');
  var gs = document.getElementById('nc-gold-sub');
  var ss = document.getElementById('nc-silver-sub');
  if(gv) gv.textContent = fmtCLarge(goldNisab);
  if(sv) sv.textContent = fmtCLarge(silverNisab);
  if(gs) gs.textContent = ACT + ' (live price)';
  if(ss) ss.textContent = ACT + ' (live price)';
  
  // Update nisab display in adv calc
  var an = document.getElementById('adv-nisab-val');
  if(an) an.textContent = fmtCLarge(silverNisab)+' (Silver)';
  
  calcAdv();
}

// ===== CURRENCY CHANGE =====
function setCurrency(code){
  if(!CURR[code]) return;
  ACT = code;
  var c = CURR[code];
  
  document.getElementById('global-currency').value = code;
  document.getElementById('active-curr-lbl').textContent = c.label;
  
  // Update pills
  document.querySelectorAll('.cpill').forEach(function(p){
    p.classList.remove('active');
    if(p.onclick && p.onclick.toString().indexOf("'"+code+"'")!==-1) p.classList.add('active');
  });
  
  // Update adv header
  var lbl = document.getElementById('adv-curr-lbl');
  if(lbl) lbl.textContent = c.label;
  
  // Update all currency symbols
  document.querySelectorAll('.adv-sym').forEach(function(el){el.textContent=c.sym;});
  
  // Update nisab labels
  var nl = document.getElementById('nisab-curr-lbl');
  if(nl) nl.textContent = code;
  
  // Recalculate with new currency
  updateMetals();
  updatePricePills();
  updateNisabLive();
  calcAdv();
  // Update modal if open
  if(modal && modal.classList.contains('open')){
    document.querySelectorAll('.modal-curr-bar .modal-cpill').forEach(function(p){
      p.classList.toggle('active', p.textContent.indexOf(code)>-1);
    });
    document.querySelectorAll('.modal-sym,.adv-sym').forEach(function(el){el.textContent=c.sym;});
    if(_calcCryptoFn)_calcCryptoFn();
    else if(_calcGenericFn)_calcGenericFn();
    else if(_calcMetalFn)_calcMetalFn();
  }
}

function setPill(el, code){
  document.querySelectorAll('.cpill').forEach(function(p){p.classList.remove('active');});
  el.classList.add('active');
  setCurrency(code);
}

// ===== ADVANCED CALCULATOR =====
function getV(id){return parseFloat(document.getElementById(id).value)||0;}

function calcAdv(){
  var c = CURR[ACT];
  var sym = c.sym;
  var cash=getV('adv-cash'),gold=getV('adv-gold'),silver=getV('adv-silver'),stocks=getV('adv-stocks'),biz=getV('adv-biz'),liab=getV('adv-liab');
  var total=cash+gold+silver+stocks+biz;
  var net=Math.max(0,total-liab);
  
  // Use live nisab if available, otherwise fallback
  var nisab = (LIVE.silverUSD && LIVE.silverUSD>0) ? (LIVE.silverUSD * 595 * c.rate) : c.nisabS;
  var zakat=net>=nisab?net*0.025:0;
  
  var tEl=document.getElementById('adv-total');
  var lEl=document.getElementById('adv-liab-show');
  var nEl=document.getElementById('adv-net');
  var zEl=document.getElementById('adv-zakat');
  var nv=document.getElementById('adv-nisab-val');
  
  if(tEl) tEl.textContent=fmtC(total);
  if(lEl) lEl.textContent='-'+fmtC(liab);
  if(nEl) nEl.textContent=fmtC(net);
  if(nv) nv.textContent=fmtCLarge(nisab)+' (Silver)';
  if(zEl){zEl.textContent=fmtC(zakat);pulse(zEl);}
  
  var box=document.getElementById('adv-nisab-box');
  var title=document.getElementById('adv-nisab-title');
  if(box&&title){
    if(net>=nisab&&net>0){box.className='nisab-box pass';title.textContent='Nisab Met \u2713 \u2014 Zakat Obligatory';}
    else{box.className='nisab-box fail';title.textContent='Below Nisab Threshold';}
  }
}
document.querySelectorAll('.adv-field,#adv-liab').forEach(function(el){el.addEventListener('input',calcAdv);});

var TC_MID          = [20,  160, 133];   // #14a085  mid teal
var TC_LIGHT        = [232, 248, 246];   // #e8f8f6  pale teal bg
var TC_PALE         = [245, 253, 252];   // #f5fdfc  alt row bg
var TC_GOLD         = [180, 130, 0  ];   // #b48200  warm gold accent
var TC_GOLD_BRIGHT  = [217, 119, 6  ];   // #d97706  bright gold
var TC_WHITE        = [255, 255, 255];
var TC_DARK         = [7,   26,  24 ];   // #071a18  near-black
var TC_GRAY         = [80,  110, 105];   // muted green-gray
var TC_LGRAY        = [194, 232, 227];   // light teal gray
var TC_GREEN_OK     = [5,   120, 80 ];   // nisab met green

// ── HELPERS ──────────────────────────────────────────────────
function pdfRGB(arr){ return arr; }
function setFill(doc, arr){ doc.setFillColor(arr[0],arr[1],arr[2]); }
function setStroke(doc, arr){ doc.setDrawColor(arr[0],arr[1],arr[2]); }
function setTxt(doc, arr){ doc.setTextColor(arr[0],arr[1],arr[2]); }

// ── PAGE CONSTANTS ────────────────────────────────────────────
var PDF_HEADER_H  = 58;   // header band height
var PDF_FOOTER_H  = 32;   // footer band height
var PDF_MARGIN    = 14;

// ============================================================
//  buildPDFBase — header + footer (called on every page)
// ============================================================
function buildPDFBase(doc, toolName, currency){
  var pageW = doc.internal.pageSize.getWidth();
  var pageH = doc.internal.pageSize.getHeight();
  var today = new Date();
  var dateStr = today.toLocaleDateString('en-GB',{year:'numeric',month:'long',day:'numeric'});
  var timeStr = today.toLocaleTimeString('en-US',{hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit'});

  // ── HEADER BACKGROUND ──────────────────────────────────────
  setFill(doc, TC_HEADER_DARK);
  doc.rect(0, 0, pageW, PDF_HEADER_H, 'F');
  // Right-side teal-mid fade strip
  setFill(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.rect(pageW * 0.5, 0, pageW * 0.5, PDF_HEADER_H, 'F');
  // Top shimmer highlight (thin bright band)
  setFill(doc, TC_MID);
  doc.rect(0, 0, pageW, 2.5, 'F');

  // ── ZS LOGO SHIELD ─────────────────────────────────────────
  var lx=12, ly=10, lw=34, lh=34, lr=7;
  // outer glow ring
  setFill(doc, [0, 60, 62]);
  doc.roundedRect(lx-1, ly-1, lw+2, lh+2, lr+1, lr+1, 'F');
  // main bg
  setFill(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.roundedRect(lx, ly, lw, lh, lr, lr, 'F');
  // top shine
  setFill(doc, TC_MID);
  doc.roundedRect(lx, ly, lw, lh*0.45, lr, lr, 'F');
  doc.rect(lx, ly+lh*0.35, lw, lh*0.1, 'F');
  // gold accent strip
  setFill(doc, TC_GOLD);
  doc.rect(lx+3, ly+lh-8, lw-6, 2.5, 'F');
  // ZS text
  doc.setFontSize(14); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, TC_WHITE);
  doc.text('ZS', lx+lw/2, ly+lh*0.65, {align:'center'});

  // ── BRAND TEXT ─────────────────────────────────────────────
  var bx = lx + lw + 9;
  doc.setFontSize(21); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, TC_WHITE);
  doc.text('ZakatSuite', bx, 26);
  doc.setFontSize(8.5); doc.setFont('helvetica','normal');
  setTxt(doc, [180, 230, 226]);
  doc.text('Islamic Finance Tools  \u00B7  zakatsuite.com  \u00B7  Always Free', bx, 35);
  setTxt(doc, [140, 200, 195]);
  doc.text('Shariah-Compliant  \u00B7  Live Prices  \u00B7  200+ Tools', bx, 44);
  // gold verified badge
  setFill(doc, TC_GOLD);
  doc.roundedRect(bx, 47, 68, 8, 2, 2, 'F');
  doc.setFontSize(6); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, TC_WHITE);
  doc.text('\u2713  SHARIAH-VERIFIED  \u00B7  AAOIFI COMPLIANT', bx+4, 52.5);

  // ── DECORATIVE CIRCLES (right side depth) ──────────────────
  try{ doc.setGState(doc.GState({opacity:0.08})); }catch(e){}
  setFill(doc, TC_WHITE);
  [28,22,16,10].forEach(function(r,i){
    doc.circle(pageW - 18 + i*4, 10 + i*6, r, 'F');
  });
  try{ doc.setGState(doc.GState({opacity:1.0})); }catch(e){}

  // ── GOLD DIAGONAL ACCENT LINE ──────────────────────────────
  setStroke(doc, TC_GOLD);
  doc.setLineWidth(0.6);
  try{ doc.setGState(doc.GState({opacity:0.5})); }catch(e){}
  doc.line(pageW*0.48, 0, pageW*0.38, PDF_HEADER_H);
  try{ doc.setGState(doc.GState({opacity:1.0})); }catch(e){}

  // ── REPORT META STRIP (light teal below header) ───────────
  var metaY = PDF_HEADER_H;
  setFill(doc, TC_LIGHT);
  doc.rect(0, metaY, pageW, 26, 'F');
  // left gold accent bar
  setFill(doc, TC_GOLD);
  doc.rect(0, metaY, 5, 26, 'F');
  // gold dot at top of bar
  setFill(doc, TC_GOLD_BRIGHT);
  doc.circle(2.5, metaY, 3, 'F');
  // report title
  doc.setFontSize(12.5); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, TC_HEADER_DARK);
  var titleLines = doc.splitTextToSize(toolName, pageW - 80);
  doc.text(titleLines, 12, metaY + 10);
  // meta info right-side
  doc.setFontSize(7.5); doc.setFont('helvetica','normal');
  setTxt(doc, TC_GRAY);
  doc.text('Generated: ' + dateStr + ' ' + timeStr, pageW - PDF_MARGIN, metaY + 8, {align:'right'});
  doc.text('Currency: ' + currency + '   |   Nisab: Silver 595g   |   Rate: 2.5%', pageW - PDF_MARGIN, metaY + 16, {align:'right'});
  // teal divider line
  setStroke(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.setLineWidth(1.0);
  doc.line(0, metaY + 26, pageW, metaY + 26);
  // gold center dot on divider
  setFill(doc, TC_GOLD);
  doc.circle(pageW/2, metaY + 26, 2, 'F');
  setFill(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.circle(PDF_MARGIN, metaY + 26, 1.5, 'F');
  doc.circle(pageW - PDF_MARGIN, metaY + 26, 1.5, 'F');

  // ── FOOTER ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
  var fy = pageH - PDF_FOOTER_H;
  // background
  setFill(doc, TC_HEADER_DARK);
  doc.rect(0, fy, pageW, PDF_FOOTER_H, 'F');
  // top accent line — teal
  setStroke(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.setLineWidth(1.5);
  doc.line(0, fy, pageW, fy);
  // gold left accent
  setFill(doc, TC_GOLD);
  doc.rect(0, fy, 4, PDF_FOOTER_H, 'F');
  // ZakatSuite brand line
  doc.setFontSize(8.5); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, [180, 230, 226]);
  doc.text('ZakatSuite  \u2014  zakatsuite.com', PDF_MARGIN + 2, fy + 10);
  doc.setFontSize(7.5); doc.setFont('helvetica','normal');
  setTxt(doc, [120, 180, 175]);
  doc.text('Free Shariah-Compliant Zakat Calculator  |  Live Gold, Silver & Crypto Prices  |  200+ Islamic Finance Tools', PDF_MARGIN + 2, fy + 18);
  // disclaimer
  setTxt(doc, [80, 130, 125]);
  doc.text('For educational purposes only. Consult a qualified Islamic scholar for your specific Zakat situation.', PDF_MARGIN + 2, fy + 26);
  // right: verified stamp
  setFill(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.roundedRect(pageW - 52, fy + 6, 48, 18, 3, 3, 'F');
  doc.setFontSize(6.5); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, TC_WHITE);
  doc.text('\u2713 SHARIAH', pageW - 28, fy + 13, {align:'center'});
  doc.text('COMPLIANT', pageW - 28, fy + 20, {align:'center'});

  return {pageW:pageW, pageH:pageH, dateStr:dateStr, timeStr:timeStr, contentStart: PDF_HEADER_H + 34};
}

// ============================================================
//  drawSectionTitle — teal section header bar
// ============================================================
function drawSectionTitle(doc, title, y, pageW){
  // bg row
  setFill(doc, TC_LIGHT);
  doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y-5, pageW - PDF_MARGIN*2, 14, 'F');
  // left accent bar
  setFill(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y-5, 3.5, 14, 'F');
  // title text
  doc.setFont('helvetica','bold'); doc.setFontSize(9.5);
  setTxt(doc, TC_HEADER_DARK);
  doc.text(title.toUpperCase(), PDF_MARGIN + 7, y + 4.5);
  // right gold accent dot
  setFill(doc, TC_GOLD);
  doc.circle(pageW - PDF_MARGIN - 3, y + 2, 3, 'F');
  return y + 17;
}

// ============================================================
//  drawSummaryTable — alternating teal rows
// ============================================================
function drawSummaryTable(doc, rows, startY, pageW){
  var y = startY;
  rows.forEach(function(r, i){
    if(r[0].indexOf('---') !== -1){
      // separator
      setStroke(doc, TC_LGRAY);
      doc.setLineWidth(0.4);
      doc.line(PDF_MARGIN, y, pageW - PDF_MARGIN, y);
      y += 7; return;
    }
    var isHighlight = r[2] === 'highlight';
    var isTotal     = r[2] === 'total';
    // row bg
    if(isTotal){
      setFill(doc, [200, 238, 234]);
      doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y-6, pageW-PDF_MARGIN*2, 13, 'F');
      setFill(doc, TC_TEAL);
      doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y-6, 2, 13, 'F');
    } else if(isHighlight){
      setFill(doc, TC_LIGHT);
      doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y-6, pageW-PDF_MARGIN*2, 13, 'F');
      setFill(doc, TC_MID);
      doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y-6, 2, 13, 'F');
    } else if(i % 2 === 0){
      setFill(doc, TC_LIGHT);
      doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y-6, pageW-PDF_MARGIN*2, 13, 'F');
      setFill(doc, TC_LGRAY);
      doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y-6, 1.5, 13, 'F');
    } else {
      setFill(doc, TC_PALE);
      doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y-6, pageW-PDF_MARGIN*2, 13, 'F');
      setFill(doc, TC_LGRAY);
      doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y-6, 1.5, 13, 'F');
    }
    // label
    doc.setFont('helvetica', isTotal?'bold':'normal');
    doc.setFontSize(isTotal ? 10.5 : 10);
    setTxt(doc, isTotal ? TC_HEADER_DARK : TC_GRAY);
    doc.text(r[0], PDF_MARGIN + 6, y);
    // value
    doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
    setTxt(doc, r[1] && r[1].charAt&&r[1].charAt(0)==='-' ? [200,50,50] : (isTotal ? TC_TEAL : TC_DARK));
    doc.text(r[1]||'', pageW - PDF_MARGIN - 3, y, {align:'right'});
    // row separator
    setStroke(doc, [220, 240, 238]);
    doc.setLineWidth(0.2);
    doc.line(PDF_MARGIN, y+6, pageW-PDF_MARGIN, y+6);
    y += 14;
  });
  return y;
}

// ============================================================
//  drawNetWealthBox — teal raised box
// ============================================================
function drawNetWealthBox(doc, label, amount, y, pageW){
  setFill(doc, [200, 238, 234]);
  doc.roundedRect(PDF_MARGIN, y, pageW-PDF_MARGIN*2, 20, 4, 4, 'F');
  setFill(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y, 5, 20, 'F');
  // top teal border
  setStroke(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.setLineWidth(1.2);
  doc.line(PDF_MARGIN, y, pageW-PDF_MARGIN, y);
  doc.setFont('helvetica','bold'); doc.setFontSize(11);
  setTxt(doc, TC_HEADER_DARK);
  doc.text(label, PDF_MARGIN + 9, y + 12);
  setTxt(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.text(amount, pageW - PDF_MARGIN - 3, y + 12, {align:'right'});
  return y + 28;
}

// ============================================================
//  drawNisabBadge — green (met) / gray (not met)
// ============================================================
function drawNisabBadge(doc, met, nisabAmt, y, pageW){
  var bgColor  = met ? [209, 250, 229] : [241, 245, 249];
  var barColor = met ? TC_GREEN_OK     : [100, 116, 139];
  var txtColor = met ? TC_GREEN_OK     : [71, 85, 105];
  // badge bg
  setFill(doc, bgColor);
  doc.roundedRect(PDF_MARGIN, y, pageW-PDF_MARGIN*2, 18, 4, 4, 'F');
  // left bar
  setFill(doc, barColor);
  doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y, 4, 18, 'F');
  // icon circle
  setFill(doc, barColor);
  doc.circle(PDF_MARGIN + 12, y + 9, 5, 'F');
  doc.setFontSize(8); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, TC_WHITE);
  doc.text(met ? '\u2713' : '\u2717', PDF_MARGIN + 12, y + 11.5, {align:'center'});
  // main text
  doc.setFontSize(10); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, txtColor);
  doc.text(
    met ? 'Nisab Met \u2014 Zakat is Obligatory' : 'Below Nisab \u2014 Zakat Not Due This Year',
    PDF_MARGIN + 21, y + 11
  );
  // nisab amount right
  doc.setFont('helvetica','normal'); doc.setFontSize(9);
  setTxt(doc, TC_GRAY);
  doc.text('Nisab: ' + nisabAmt, pageW - PDF_MARGIN - 3, y + 11, {align:'right'});
  return y + 26;
}

// ============================================================
//  drawZakatBox — large teal gradient result box
// ============================================================
function drawZakatBox(doc, amount, y, pageW){
  var bh = 48;
  // shadow layer
  setFill(doc, [3, 40, 42]);
  doc.roundedRect(PDF_MARGIN + 2, y + 3, pageW - PDF_MARGIN*2, bh, 8, 8, 'F');
  // main bg — deep teal
  setFill(doc, TC_HEADER_DARK);
  doc.roundedRect(PDF_MARGIN, y, pageW - PDF_MARGIN*2, bh, 8, 8, 'F');
  // right teal-mid gradient strip
  setFill(doc, TC_TEAL);
  doc.roundedRect(pageW*0.42, y, pageW*0.58 - PDF_MARGIN, bh, 8, 8, 'F');
  // left re-cover
  setFill(doc, TC_HEADER_DARK);
  doc.roundedRect(PDF_MARGIN, y, pageW*0.44 - PDF_MARGIN, bh, 8, 8, 'F');
  // top shine
  try{ doc.setGState(doc.GState({opacity:0.18})); }catch(e){}
  setFill(doc, TC_WHITE);
  doc.roundedRect(PDF_MARGIN, y, pageW - PDF_MARGIN*2, bh*0.38, 8, 8, 'F');
  try{ doc.setGState(doc.GState({opacity:1.0})); }catch(e){}
  // gold separator line
  setStroke(doc, TC_GOLD);
  doc.setLineWidth(1.5);
  doc.line(PDF_MARGIN + 10, y + bh*0.42, pageW - PDF_MARGIN - 10, y + bh*0.42);
  // label
  doc.setFontSize(7.5); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, [180, 230, 220]);
  doc.text('TOTAL ZAKAT DUE  (2.5% of Net Zakatable Wealth)', pageW/2, y + 14, {align:'center'});
  // amount
  doc.setFontSize(26); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, TC_WHITE);
  doc.text(amount, pageW/2, y + 36, {align:'center'});
  return y + bh + 10;
}

// ============================================================
//  drawLivePrices — teal live prices strip
// ============================================================
function drawLivePrices(doc, y, pageW){
  if(!LIVE.goldUSD) return y;
  setFill(doc, TC_PALE);
  doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y, pageW-PDF_MARGIN*2, 13, 'F');
  setFill(doc, TC_GOLD);
  doc.rect(PDF_MARGIN, y, 2, 13, 'F');
  doc.setFontSize(8); doc.setFont('helvetica','normal');
  setTxt(doc, TC_GRAY);
  var priceStr = 'Live Prices  \u2014  Gold: $' + LIVE.goldUSD.toFixed(2) + '/g';
  if(LIVE.silverUSD) priceStr += '  |  Silver: $' + LIVE.silverUSD.toFixed(2) + '/g';
  if(LIVE.btc) priceStr += '  |  BTC: $' + Math.round(LIVE.btc).toLocaleString();
  doc.text(priceStr, PDF_MARGIN + 6, y + 8.5);
  // live dot
  setFill(doc, [16,185,129]);
  doc.circle(pageW - PDF_MARGIN - 3, y + 6.5, 2.5, 'F');
  doc.setFontSize(6); doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
  setTxt(doc, [16,185,129]);
  doc.text('LIVE', pageW - PDF_MARGIN - 14, y + 8.5);
  return y + 18;
}

// ============================================================
//  drawIslamicNote — educational note box
// ============================================================
function drawIslamicNote(doc, y, pageW){
  setFill(doc, TC_PALE);
