  doc.text('Silver Nisab (595g) is recommended as it is more inclusive for modern Muslims.', PDF_MARGIN + 7, y + 21);
  return y + 28;
}

// ============================================================
//  drawDistributionGuide — 8 Quranic categories
// ============================================================
function drawDistributionGuide(doc, zakatAmt, y, pageW){
  var cats = [
    ['Al-Fuqara\' (The Poor)',       '12.5%'],
    ['Al-Masakin (The Needy)',       '12.5%'],
    ['Al-Amilin (Zakat Workers)',    '12.5%'],
    ['Al-Muallafah (New Muslims)',   '12.5%'],
    ['Fi-Riqab (Freeing Captives)',  '12.5%'],
    ['Al-Gharimin (Debtors)',        '12.5%'],
    ['Fi Sabilillah (God\'s Cause)', '12.5%'],
    ['Ibn Al-Sabil (Travellers)',    '12.5%'],
  ];
  y = drawSectionTitle(doc, 'Suggested Zakat Distribution (8 Quranic Categories)', y, pageW);
  var colW = (pageW - PDF_MARGIN*2) / 2 - 4;
  cats.forEach(function(cat, i){
    var cx = PDF_MARGIN + (i%2===0 ? 0 : colW + 8);
    var cy = y + Math.floor(i/2) * 12;
    setFill(doc, i%4<2 ? TC_LIGHT : TC_PALE);
    doc.rect(cx, cy-5, colW, 11, 'F');
    setFill(doc, TC_TEAL);
    doc.rect(cx, cy-5, 2, 11, 'F');
    doc.setFontSize(8.5); doc.setFont('helvetica','normal');
    setTxt(doc, TC_DARK);
    doc.text(cat[0], cx+5, cy+2.5);
    doc.setFont('helvetica','bold');
    setTxt(doc, TC_TEAL);
    doc.text(cat[1], cx+colW-2, cy+2.5, {align:'right'});
  });
  return y + Math.ceil(cats.length/2)*12 + 6;
}

// ============================================================
//  downloadAdvPDF — COMPREHENSIVE ZAKAT REPORT
// ============================================================
function downloadAdvPDF(){
  try{
    var c = CURR[ACT];
    var fmt=function(n){return c.code+' '+n.toLocaleString('en-US',{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2});};
    var cash   = getV('adv-cash');
    var gold   = getV('adv-gold');
    var silver = getV('adv-silver');
    var stocks = getV('adv-stocks');
    var biz    = getV('adv-biz');
    var liab   = getV('adv-liab');
    var total  = cash + gold + silver + stocks + biz;
    var net    = Math.max(0, total - liab);
    var nisabS = (LIVE.silverUSD&&LIVE.silverUSD>0) ? (LIVE.silverUSD*595*c.rate) : c.nisabS;
    var nisabG = (LIVE.goldUSD&&LIVE.goldUSD>0)     ? (LIVE.goldUSD*85*c.rate)    : c.nisabG;
    var met    = net >= nisabS;
    var zakat  = met ? net * 0.025 : 0;

    var doc  = new window.jspdf.jsPDF();
    var meta = buildPDFBase(doc, 'Comprehensive Zakat Calculation Report', c.label);
    var pageW= meta.pageW;
    var y    = meta.contentStart;

    // ── ASSET BREAKDOWN ─────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawSectionTitle(doc, 'Asset Breakdown', y, pageW);
    var rows = [
      ['Cash in Hand & Bank',   fmt(cash)],
      ['\uD83D\uDC8E Gold Value',           fmt(gold)],
      ['\uD83E\uDE99 Silver Value',         fmt(silver)],
      ['\uD83D\uDCC8 Stocks & Investments', fmt(stocks)],
      ['\uD83D\uDCBC Business Assets',      fmt(biz)],
    ];
    y = drawSummaryTable(doc, rows, y, pageW);
    y += 4;

    // ── TOTALS ──────────────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawSectionTitle(doc, 'Wealth Summary', y, pageW);
    var summRows = [
      ['Total Assets (Gross)',       fmt(total)],
      ['Deductible Liabilities',    '-' + fmt(liab)],
      ['Net Zakatable Wealth',       fmt(net), 'total'],
    ];
    y = drawSummaryTable(doc, summRows, y, pageW);
    y += 6;

    // ── NET WEALTH BOX ──────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawNetWealthBox(doc, 'Net Zakatable Wealth', fmt(net), y, pageW);

    // ── NISAB COMPARISON ────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawSectionTitle(doc, 'Nisab Threshold Comparison', y, pageW);
    var nisabRows = [
      ['Silver Nisab (595g)', fmt(nisabS), 'highlight'],
      ['Gold Nisab (85g)',    fmt(nisabG), 'highlight'],
      ['Your Net Wealth',    fmt(net)],
      ['Standard Used',      'Silver (recommended)'],
    ];
    y = drawSummaryTable(doc, nisabRows, y, pageW);
    y += 6;

    // ── LIVE PRICES ─────────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawLivePrices(doc, y, pageW);

    // ── NISAB STATUS BADGE ───────────────────────────────────
    y = drawNisabBadge(doc, met, fmt(nisabS), y, pageW);
    y += 4;

    // ── ZAKAT RESULT BOX ─────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawZakatBox(doc, fmt(zakat), y, pageW);

    // ── DISTRIBUTION GUIDE ───────────────────────────────────
    if(y + 80 < meta.pageH - PDF_FOOTER_H - 10){
      y = drawDistributionGuide(doc, zakat, y, pageW);
    }

    // ── ISLAMIC NOTE ─────────────────────────────────────────
    if(y + 36 < meta.pageH - PDF_FOOTER_H - 10){
      y = drawIslamicNote(doc, y, pageW);
    }

    doc.save('ZakatSuite-Comprehensive-Report-' +
      meta.dateStr.replace(/,/g,'').replace(/ /g,'-') + '.pdf');
  }catch(e){ console.warn('PDF Error: '+e.message); }
}

// ============================================================
//  downloadToolPDF — INDIVIDUAL TOOL REPORT
// ============================================================
function downloadToolPDF(toolName){
  try{
    var c   = CURR[ACT]; var sym = c.sym;
    var fmt = function(n){return c.code+' '+n.toLocaleString('en-US',{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2});};

    // ── Gather values ────────────────────────────────────────
    var total = 0;
    document.querySelectorAll('.modal-entry-val').forEach(function(el){
      total += parseFloat(el.value) || 0;
    });
    var liab = parseFloat((document.getElementById('modal-liab')||{}).value) || 0;
    var net  = Math.max(0, total - liab);

    // Gold/Silver override
    var gsW = parseFloat((document.getElementById('gs-weight')||{}).value) || 0;
    var gsP = parseFloat((document.getElementById('gs-price')||{}).value)  || 0;
    if(gsW && gsP){
      var k  = parseInt(((document.getElementById('gs-karat')||{value:'24'}).value) || 24);
      total  = gsW * gsP * (k/24); net = total; liab = 0;
    }
    // Crypto override
    var cryptoT = 0; var cryptoRows = [];
    document.querySelectorAll('#tok-container .tok-card').forEach(function(card){
      var id     = card.id.replace('tok-card-','');
      var symEl  = document.getElementById('tok-sym-'+id);
      var tokSym = symEl ? symEl.value : 'TOKEN';
      var a      = parseFloat((document.getElementById('tok-amt-'+id)||{}).value)   || 0;
      var p      = parseFloat((document.getElementById('tok-price-'+id)||{}).value) || 0;
      var v      = a * p; cryptoT += v;
      if(a > 0 || p > 0) cryptoRows.push([tokSym + ' (' + a + ' units)', fmt(v)]);
    });
    if(cryptoT > 0){ total = cryptoT; net = cryptoT; liab = 0; }

    var nisabS = (LIVE.silverUSD&&LIVE.silverUSD>0) ? (LIVE.silverUSD*595*c.rate) : c.nisabS;
    var nisabG = (LIVE.goldUSD&&LIVE.goldUSD>0)     ? (LIVE.goldUSD*85*c.rate)    : c.nisabG;
    var met    = net >= nisabS;
    var zakat  = met ? net * 0.025 : 0;

    var doc  = new window.jspdf.jsPDF();
    var meta = buildPDFBase(doc, toolName + ' \u2014 Zakat Report', c.label);
    var pageW= meta.pageW;
    var y    = meta.contentStart;

    // ── TOOL INFO ────────────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawSectionTitle(doc, 'Calculation Details', y, pageW);
    var infoRows = [
      ['Tool Used', toolName],
      ['Currency',  c.code + ' (' + sym + ')'],
      ['Date',      meta.dateStr + ' at ' + meta.timeStr],
      ['Nisab Standard', 'Silver 595g (Recommended)'],
    ];
    y = drawSummaryTable(doc, infoRows, y, pageW);
    y += 6;

    // ── CRYPTO BREAKDOWN ─────────────────────────────────────
    if(cryptoRows.length > 0){
      y = drawSectionTitle(doc, 'Token Portfolio Breakdown', y, pageW);
      y = drawSummaryTable(doc, cryptoRows, y, pageW);
      y += 6;
    }

    // ── ASSET SUMMARY ────────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawSectionTitle(doc, 'Asset & Nisab Summary', y, pageW);
    var summRows = [
      ['Total Asset Value',          fmt(total)],
      ['Deductible Liabilities',     '-' + fmt(liab)],
      ['Net Zakatable Wealth',        fmt(net), 'total'],
      ['Silver Nisab (595g)',         fmt(nisabS), 'highlight'],
      ['Gold Nisab (85g)',            fmt(nisabG), 'highlight'],
    ];
    y = drawSummaryTable(doc, summRows, y, pageW);
    y += 6;

    // ── LIVE PRICES ─────────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawLivePrices(doc, y, pageW);

    // ── NET WEALTH BOX ───────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawNetWealthBox(doc, 'Net Zakatable Wealth', fmt(net), y, pageW);

    // ── NISAB BADGE ──────────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawNisabBadge(doc, met, fmt(nisabS), y, pageW);
    y += 4;

    // ── ZAKAT RESULT ─────────────────────────────────────────
    y = drawZakatBox(doc, fmt(zakat), y, pageW);

    // ── ISLAMIC NOTE ─────────────────────────────────────────
    if(y + 36 < meta.pageH - PDF_FOOTER_H - 10){
      y = drawIslamicNote(doc, y, pageW);
    }

    doc.save('ZakatSuite-' + toolName.replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/g,'-') + '.pdf');
  }catch(e){ console.warn('PDF Error: '+e.message); }
}

// ===== RENDER TOOLS =====
var activeCat='all',activeSearch='';
function renderTools(){
  var g=document.getElementById('tools-grid');
  g.innerHTML='';
  var filtered=tools.filter(function(t){
    var cm=activeCat==='all'||t.cat===activeCat;
    var sm=!activeSearch||t.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(activeSearch)!==-1||t.desc.toLowerCase().indexOf(activeSearch)!==-1;
    return cm&&sm;
  });
  if(!filtered.length){g.innerHTML='<div style="grid-column:1/-1;text-align:center;padding:60px;color:var(--n4)"><div style="font-size:48px;margin-bottom:14px">\uD83D\uDD0D</div><div style="font-size:15px;font-weight:600">No tools found</div></div>';return;}
  filtered.forEach(function(t,idx){
    var card=document.createElement('article');
    card.className='tool-card '+(catMap[t.cat]||'tc-core');
    card.setAttribute('data-tid',t.id);
    var pb=t.premium?'<span class="prem-badge">\u2728 Pro</span>':'';
    var desc=t.desc.length>80?t.desc.substring(0,80)+'...':t.desc;
    var tx=T[ACT_LANG]||T['en'];
    var openTxt=tx.open_calc||'Open Calculator \u2192';
    // Get translated name and desc from TOOL_TRANS
    var ttrans = TOOL_TRANS[ACT_LANG] && TOOL_TRANS[ACT_LANG][t.id];
    var dispName = ttrans ? ttrans.n : ((tx.tool_names && tx.tool_names[t.id]) ? tx.tool_names[t.id] : t.name);
    var dispDesc = ttrans ? ttrans.d : (t.desc.length>80 ? t.desc.substring(0,80)+'...' : t.desc);
    // Category label translation
    var catKeyMap={'Core':'cat_core','Nisab':'cat_nisab','Haul':'cat_haul','Business':'cat_business',
      'Crypto':'cat_crypto','Property':'cat_property','Family':'cat_family','Distribution':'cat_dist',
      'Advanced':'cat_adv','Reporting':'cat_reporting','Compliance':'cat_compliance','Logic':'cat_logic',
      'Consumer':'cat_consumer','Institutional':'cat_institutional','Niche':'cat_niche'};
    var catLabel = (catKeyMap[t.cat] && tx[catKeyMap[t.cat]]) ? tx[catKeyMap[t.cat]] : t.cat;
    card.innerHTML='<div class="tc-icon">'+t.icon+'</div><div class="tc-cat">'+catLabel+pb+'</div><h4>'+dispName+'</h4><p>'+dispDesc+'</p><span class="tc-link">'+openTxt+'</span>';
    card.onclick=function(){openTool(t.id);};
    g.appendChild(card);
    // Insert ad after every 8 tool cards
    if((idx+1)%8===0){
      var adDiv=document.createElement('div');
      adDiv.style.cssText='grid-column:1/-1;text-align:center;padding:6px 0';
      adDiv.innerHTML='<div class="ad-lbl">Advertisement</div>'+
        '<div class="ad-slot" style="min-height:90px;max-width:900px;margin:0 auto;border-radius:12px">'+
        '<ins class="adsbygoogle" style="display:block;width:100%;min-height:90px" data-ad-client="ca-pub-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX" data-ad-slot="6666666666" data-ad-format="auto" data-full-width-responsive="true"></ins>'+
        '</div>';
      g.appendChild(adDiv);
      try{(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});}catch(e){}
    }
  });
}

function setModalCurr(code){
  if(!code||!CURR[code])return;
  ACT=code;
  var c=CURR[code];var sym=c.sym;

  // Update global currency selector & labels
  var gcSel=document.getElementById('global-currency');if(gcSel)gcSel.value=code;
  var acl=document.getElementById('active-curr-lbl');if(acl)acl.textContent=c.label;
  document.querySelectorAll('.cpill').forEach(function(p){p.classList.remove('active');if(p.getAttribute&&p.getAttribute('onclick')&&p.getAttribute('onclick').indexOf("'"+code+"'")>-1)p.classList.add('active');});

  // Update dropdown trigger label
  var mf2=document.getElementById('modal-curr-flag');
  var mc2=document.getElementById('modal-curr-code');
  if(mf2)mf2.textContent=c.flag;
  if(mc2)mc2.textContent=code;
  // Close dropdown
  var drop=document.getElementById('modal-curr-drop');
  var trig=document.getElementById('modal-curr-trigger');
  if(drop)drop.classList.remove('open');
  if(trig)trig.classList.remove('open');
  // Refresh list to update active state
  buildModalCurrList('');

  // Update ALL currency symbol spans in modal
  document.querySelectorAll('#modal-body .inp-pre').forEach(function(el){el.textContent=sym;});
  document.querySelectorAll('#modal-body .modal-sym').forEach(function(el){el.textContent=sym;});

  // Update results section title
  var resTitle=document.querySelector('#modal-body .calc-r .sec-title');
  if(resTitle)resTitle.textContent='Results — '+c.label;

  // Update nisab shown in results
  document.querySelectorAll('#modal-body .ns strong').forEach(function(el){el.textContent=sym+' '+Math.round(c.nisabS);});

  // Update live price for metal modals and recalc
  var gsPrice=document.getElementById('gs-price');
  if(gsPrice){
    var isGold=!!document.getElementById('gs-karat');
    var liveP=isGold?(LIVE.goldUSD*c.rate):(LIVE.silverUSD*c.rate);
    if(liveP>0)gsPrice.value=liveP.toFixed(2);
  }

  // Update crypto token prices
  var tokContainer=document.getElementById('tok-container');
  if(tokContainer){
    // Update tok-price currency display in token rows
    document.querySelectorAll('[id^="tok-price-"]').forEach(function(inp){
      // scale existing price by rate ratio - not perfect but better UX
    });
  }

  // Re-run whichever calculator is active
  if(_calcMetalFn)_calcMetalFn();
  else if(_calcCryptoFn)_calcCryptoFn();
  else if(_calcGenericFn)_calcGenericFn();

  // Also update nisab tracker and prices bar
  updateMetals();
  updatePricePills();
  updateNisabLive();
}
function buildModalCurrList(filter){
  var list=document.getElementById('mcd-list');if(!list)return;
  var q=(filter||'').toLowerCase();
  var html='';
  Object.keys(CURR).forEach(function(code){
    var cc=CURR[code];
    if(q && cc.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(q)===-1 && code.toLowerCase().indexOf(q)===-1) return;
    var active=ACT===code?' active':'';
    html+='<div class="mcd-item'+active+'" data-curr="'+code+'">'
      +'<span class="mcd-flag">'+cc.flag+'</span>'
      +'<span>'+code+'</span>'
      +'<span class="mcd-name">'+cc.name+'</span>'
      +'</div>';
  });
  list.innerHTML=html||'<div style="padding:12px;text-align:center;font-size:11px;color:var(--n4)">No results</div>';
  // Attach click events directly (no inline onclick = no quote issues)
  list.querySelectorAll('.mcd-item').forEach(function(el){
    el.addEventListener('click', function(){
      setModalCurr(this.getAttribute('data-curr'));
    });
  });
}
function toggleModalCurrDrop(){
  var drop=document.getElementById('modal-curr-drop');
  var trigger=document.getElementById('modal-curr-trigger');
  if(!drop)return;
  var isOpen=drop.classList.toggle('open');
  trigger.classList.toggle('open',isOpen);
  if(isOpen){
    var inp=document.getElementById('mcd-search');
    if(inp){inp.value='';inp.focus();}
    buildModalCurrList('');
  }
}
function filterModalCurr(val){buildModalCurrList(val);}
// Close dropdown when clicking outside
document.addEventListener('click',function(e){
  var wrap=document.getElementById('modal-curr-trigger');
  var drop=document.getElementById('modal-curr-drop');
  if(!wrap||!drop)return;
  if(!wrap.contains(e.target)&&!drop.contains(e.target)){
    drop.classList.remove('open');
    wrap.classList.remove('open');
  }
});

function openTool(tid){
  var t=tools.find(function(x){return x.id===tid;});
  if(!t)return;
  var ttrans2 = TOOL_TRANS[ACT_LANG] && TOOL_TRANS[ACT_LANG][t.id];
  modalTitle.textContent = ttrans2 ? ttrans2.n : t.name;
  var html='';
  if(t.type==='gold'||t.type==='silver') html=buildMetalCalc(t);
  else if(t.type==='crypto') html=buildCryptoCalc(t);
  else if(typeof CUSTOM_BUILDERS[t.id]==='function') html=CUSTOM_BUILDERS[t.id](t);
  else html=buildGenericCalc(t);
  // Update modal header currency trigger
  var mf=document.getElementById('modal-curr-flag');
  var mc=document.getElementById('modal-curr-code');
  if(mf)mf.textContent=CURR[ACT].flag;
  if(mc)mc.textContent=ACT;
  buildModalCurrList('');
  var txM=T[ACT_LANG]||T['en'];
  // Add ad slot inside modal
  html += '<div style="padding:16px 0 4px"><div class="ad-lbl">Advertisement</div>'+
    '<div class="ad-slot" style="min-height:90px;border-radius:12px">'+
    '<ins class="adsbygoogle" style="display:block;width:100%;min-height:90px" data-ad-client="ca-pub-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX" data-ad-slot="5555555555" data-ad-format="auto" data-full-width-responsive="true"></ins>'+
    '</div></div>';
  // SEO: inject tool structured data
  var existSD=document.getElementById('tool-sd');if(existSD)existSD.remove();
  var sd=document.createElement('script');sd.type='application/ld+json';sd.id='tool-sd';
  sd.textContent=JSON.stringify({"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"WebApplication","name":t.name,"description":t.desc,"applicationCategory":"FinanceApplication","operatingSystem":"Any","offers":{"@type":"Offer","price":"0","priceCurrency":"USD"},"url":"https://zakatsuite.com/#"+t.id});
  document.head.appendChild(sd);
  modalBody.innerHTML=html;
  // Apply category theme class to modal body
  var catCls=catMap[t.cat]||'tc-core';
  var modalCard=modalBody.querySelector('.calc-card');
  if(modalCard){
    // Remove old tc-* classes
    modalCard.className=modalCard.className.replace(/\btc-\S+/g,'').trim();
    modalCard.classList.add(catCls);
  }
  // Push AdSense for the newly injected ins tag
  try{(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});}catch(e){}
  modal.classList.add('open');
  modal.scrollTop=0;
  attachModalEvents(t);
}

function calcResult(totalAssets, liab, rateOverride){
  var c=CURR[ACT];var sym=c.sym;
  var net=Math.max(0,totalAssets-liab);
  var nisab=(LIVE.silverUSD&&LIVE.silverUSD>0)?(LIVE.silverUSD*595*c.rate):c.nisabS;
  var rate=rateOverride||0.025;
  var met=net>=nisab;var zakat=met?net*rate:0;
  var te=document.getElementById('modal-total');
  var le=document.getElementById('modal-liab-show');
  var ne=document.getElementById('modal-net');
  var ze=document.getElementById('modal-zakat');
  if(te)te.textContent=sym+' '+totalAssets.toFixed(2);
  if(le)le.textContent='-'+sym+' '+liab.toFixed(2);
  if(ne)ne.textContent=sym+' '+net.toFixed(2);
  if(ze){ze.textContent=sym+' '+zakat.toFixed(2);if(typeof pulse==='function')pulse(ze);}
  var box=document.getElementById('modal-nisab-box');
  var title=document.getElementById('modal-nisab-title');
  var nsEl=document.querySelector('#modal-body .ns strong');
  if(nsEl)nsEl.textContent=sym+' '+Math.round(nisab);
  if(box&&title){
    if(met){box.className='nisab-box pass';title.textContent='Zakat Eligible \u2713';}
    else{box.className='nisab-box fail';title.textContent='Below Nisab';}
  }
  return{net:net,nisab:nisab,met:met,zakat:zakat};
}

function resultsPanel(c,rateLabel){
  var sym=c.sym;
  var rl=rateLabel||'Zakat Due (2.5%)';
  return '<div class="calc-r">'+
    '<div class="sec-title">Results \u2014 '+c.label+'</div>'+
    '<div class="sum-row"><span class="lbl">Total Assets</span><span class="val" id="modal-total">'+sym+' 0.00</span></div>'+
    '<div class="sum-row"><span class="lbl">Liabilities</span><span class="val neg" id="modal-liab-show">-'+sym+' 0.00</span></div>'+
    '<hr class="sum-div">'+
    '<div class="sum-total"><span>Net Zakatable Wealth</span><span id="modal-net">'+sym+' 0.00</span></div>'+
    '<div class="nisab-box fail" id="modal-nisab-box"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" width="15" height="15" style="color:#94a3b8;flex-shrink:0"><path d="M12 2C6.48 2 2 6.48 2 12s4.48 10 10 10 10-4.48 10-10S17.52 2 12 2zm1 15h-2v-6h2v6zm0-8h-2V7h2v2z"/></svg>'+
    '<div><div class="nt" id="modal-nisab-title">Below Nisab</div><div class="ns">Nisab: <strong>'+sym+' '+Math.round(c.nisabS)+'</strong></div></div></div>'+

}

function inpGrp(lbl,id,sym,hint,ph){
  return '<div class="inp-grp"><div class="inp-lbl">'+lbl+'</div>'+
    '<div class="inp-wrap"><span class="inp-pre modal-sym">'+sym+'</span>'+
    '<input class="zs-inp modal-val" type="number" id="'+id+'" placeholder="'+(ph||'0.00')+'" min="0"></div>'+
    (hint?'<div class="inp-hint">'+hint+'</div>':'')+
  '</div>';
}

function selGrp(lbl,id,opts){
  var o=opts.map(function(x){return '<option value="'+x[0]+'">'+x[1]+'</option>';}).join('');
  return '<div class="inp-grp"><div class="inp-lbl">'+lbl+'</div>'+
    '<select class="zs-sel" id="'+id+'">'+o+'</select></div>';
}

function radioGrp(lbl,name,opts){
  var btns=opts.map(function(x){
    return '<label class="radio-opt"><input type="radio" name="'+name+'" value="'+x[0]+'"'+(x[2]?' checked':'')+'>'+x[1]+'</label>';
  }).join('');
  return '<div class="inp-grp"><div class="inp-lbl">'+lbl+'</div><div class="radio-grp">'+btns+'</div></div>';
}

function liabRow(sym){
  return '<hr class="divider">'+
    '<div class="inp-grp"><div class="inp-lbl">\u26a0\ufe0f Deductible Liabilities</div>'+
    '<div class="inp-wrap"><span class="inp-pre modal-sym">'+sym+'</span>'+
    '<input class="zs-inp" type="number" id="modal-liab" placeholder="0.00" min="0"></div>'+
    '<div class="inp-hint">Immediate debts due within the Haul year.</div></div>';
}

function sharRow(sym){
  return '<hr class="divider">'+
    '<div class="inp-grp"><div class="inp-lbl">\ud83d\udc64 Your Ownership Share (%)</div>'+
    '<div class="inp-wrap"><span class="inp-pre">%</span>'+
    '<input class="zs-inp" type="number" id="own-pct" placeholder="100" min="1" max="100" value="100"></div>'+
    '<div class="inp-hint">Enter 100 if you are the sole owner.</div></div>';
}

function infoBox(title,bullets,shariah){
  var lis=bullets.map(function(b){return '<li>'+b+'</li>';}).join('');
  return '<div class="info-box" style="margin-top:14px">'+
    '<div class="ib-title">\ud83d\udcd8 '+title+'</div>'+
    '<ul style="padding-left:16px;font-size:11px;color:var(--n6);line-height:1.9;margin:6px 0 0">'+lis+'</ul>'+
    (shariah?'<div style="margin-top:8px;padding-top:8px;border-top:1px solid var(--n2);font-size:10px;color:var(--n5)"><strong>Shariah Basis:</strong> '+shariah+'</div>':'')+
  '</div>';
}

CUSTOM_BUILDERS['agri-produce'] = function(t){
  var c=CURR[ACT];var sym=c.sym;
  _calcGenericFn = function(){
    var irr=document.querySelector('input[name="agri-irr"]:checked');
    var val=pv('agri-val');
    var cost=pv('agri-cost');
    var net=Math.max(0,val-cost);
    var rate=irr&&irr.value==='rain'?0.10:0.05;
    var zakat=net*rate;
    var te=document.getElementById('modal-total');
    var ze=document.getElementById('modal-zakat');
    var rl=document.getElementById('z-rate-lbl');
    if(te)te.textContent=sym+' '+net.toFixed(2);
    if(ze){ze.textContent=sym+' '+zakat.toFixed(2);if(typeof pulse==='function')pulse(ze);}
    if(rl)rl.textContent='Ushr Due ('+(rate*100)+'% — '+(irr&&irr.value==='rain'?'Rain-Fed':'Irrigated')+')';
    var box=document.getElementById('modal-nisab-box');
    var title=document.getElementById('modal-nisab-title');
    if(box&&title&&net>0){box.className='nisab-box pass';title.textContent='Ushr Applicable \u2713';}
    else if(box&&title){box.className='nisab-box fail';title.textContent='No Produce / Below Threshold';}
  };
  return getModalHeader(t,'var(--tc-hbg,linear-gradient(135deg,#054446,#0d7377))')+
    '<div class="calc-body"><div class="calc-l">'+
    '<div class="sec-title">Crop & Produce Details</div>'+

// ── LIVESTOCK ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
CUSTOM_BUILDERS['livestock-zakat'] = function(t){
  var c=CURR[ACT];var sym=c.sym;
  _calcGenericFn = function(){
    var type=document.getElementById('live-type').value;
    var count=pv('live-count');
    var val=pv('live-val');
    var pasture=document.querySelector('input[name="live-pasture"]:checked');
    var free=pasture&&pasture.value==='free';
    var zakatable=free&&count>=5?Math.max(0,val):0;
    var zakat=zakatable*0.025;
    var te=document.getElementById('modal-total');
    var ze=document.getElementById('modal-zakat');
    var box=document.getElementById('modal-nisab-box');
    var nt=document.getElementById('modal-nisab-title');
    if(te)te.textContent=sym+' '+val.toFixed(2);
    if(ze){ze.textContent=sym+' '+zakat.toFixed(2);if(typeof pulse==='function')pulse(ze);}
    if(box&&nt){
      if(!free){box.className='nisab-box fail';nt.textContent='Not Applicable (Stall-Fed)';}
      else if(count<5){box.className='nisab-box fail';nt.textContent='Below Nisab (min 5 animals)';}
      else{box.className='nisab-box pass';nt.textContent='Zakat Applicable \u2713';}

// ── HAUL TRACKER ──────────────────────────────────────────────
CUSTOM_BUILDERS['haul-track'] = function(t){
  var c=CURR[ACT];var sym=c.sym;
  _calcGenericFn = function(){
    var hdate=document.getElementById('haul-date').value;
    if(!hdate)return;
    var now=new Date();
    var start=new Date(hdate);
    var days=Math.floor((now-start)/(1000*60*60*24));
    var lunar=Math.floor(days/354.37);
    var remain=Math.max(0,354-days%354);
    document.getElementById('haul-days').textContent=days+' days elapsed';
    document.getElementById('haul-years').textContent=lunar+' Haul year(s) completed';
    document.getElementById('haul-remain').textContent=remain+' days until next Haul';
    var box=document.getElementById('modal-nisab-box');
    var nt=document.getElementById('modal-nisab-title');
    if(box&&nt){
      if(days>=354){box.className='nisab-box pass';nt.textContent='Haul Completed \u2713 — Zakat Due';}
      else{box.className='nisab-box fail';nt.textContent='Haul In Progress ('+remain+' days remaining)';}
    }
  };
  return getModalHeader(t,'var(--tc-hbg,linear-gradient(135deg,#054446,#0d7377))')+
    '<div class="calc-body"><div class="calc-l">'+
    '<div class="sec-title">Haul Date Tracking</div>'+
    '<div class="inp-grp"><div class="inp-lbl">\uD83D\uDCC5 Asset Acquired / Nisab First Met</div>'+
    '<input class="zs-inp" type="date" id="haul-date" style="padding-left:12px">'+
    '<div class="inp-hint">Enter the date you first owned this asset above Nisab</div></div>'+
    selGrp('Calendar Preference','haul-cal',[
      ['hijri','Hijri (Lunar) — 354 days'],
      ['gregorian','Gregorian — 365 days (some scholars)']
    ])+
    '<div class="inp-grp" style="margin-top:16px">'+
    '<div class="inp-lbl">Haul Progress</div>'+
    '<div class="info-box">'+
    '<div id="haul-days" style="font-size:16px;font-weight:700;color:var(--g1);margin-bottom:4px">Enter date above</div>'+
    '<div id="haul-years" style="font-size:12px;color:var(--n6)"></div>'+
    '<div id="haul-remain" style="font-size:12px;color:var(--n5);margin-top:4px"></div>'+
    '</div></div>'+
    infoBox('What is Haul?',
      ['Haul = 1 complete lunar year (354 days) of owning wealth above Nisab',
       'If wealth drops below Nisab mid-year, Haul resets',
       'Agricultural Zakat (Ushr) has <strong>no Haul</strong> — due at harvest',
       'Different assets can have different Haul dates'],
      'Haul is a condition for Zakat validity on most assets (gold, cash, trade goods). Agreed upon by all madhabs.')+
    '</div>'+
    '<div class="calc-r">'+
    '<div class="sec-title">Haul Status</div>'+
    '<div class="sum-row"><span class="lbl">Days Elapsed</span><span class="val" id="haul-days-r">—</span></div>'+
    '<div class="sum-row"><span class="lbl">Haul Years Done</span><span class="val" id="haul-years-r">—</span></div>'+
    '<hr class="sum-div">'+
    '<div class="nisab-box fail" id="modal-nisab-box"><svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" width="15" height="15" style="color:#94a3b8;flex-shrink:0"><path d="M12 2C6.48 2 2 6.48 2 12s4.48 10 10 10 10-4.48 10-10S17.52 2 12 2zm1 15h-2v-6h2v6zm0-8h-2V7h2v2z"/></svg><div><div class="nt" id="modal-nisab-title">Enter your Haul start date</div></div></div>'+

// ── ALLOCATION PLANNER ────────────────────────────────────────
CUSTOM_BUILDERS['alloc-plan'] = function(t){
  var c=CURR[ACT];var sym=c.sym;
  var cats8=[
    ['Fuqara','The Poor'],['Masakin','The Needy'],['Amileen','Zakat Collectors'],
    ['Muallafah','New Muslims'],['Riqab','Freeing Captives'],['Gharimeen','Debtors'],
    ['Fi Sabilillah','In the Way of Allah'],['Ibn al-Sabil','Wayfarers / Travellers']
  ];
  _calcGenericFn = function(){
    var total=pv('alloc-total');
    var sum=0;
    cats8.forEach(function(cat,i){
      var pct=pv('alloc-pct-'+i);
      sum+=pct;
      var amt=total*(pct/100);
      var el=document.getElementById('alloc-amt-'+i);
      if(el)el.textContent=sym+' '+amt.toFixed(2);
    });
    document.getElementById('alloc-sum').textContent=sum.toFixed(1)+'%';

// Helper — parse value safely
function pv(id){
  var el=document.getElementById(id);
  return el?Math.max(0,parseFloat(el.value)||0):0;
}



// ===== ATTACH MODAL EVENTS =====
var tokCount=3;
function attachModalEvents(t){
  if(t.type==='gold'||t.type==='silver'){
    var isG=t.type==='gold';
    _calcMetalFn = function(){
      var c=CURR[ACT];var sym=c.sym;
      var w=parseFloat(document.getElementById('gs-weight').value)||0;
      var p=parseFloat(document.getElementById('gs-price').value)||0;
      var k=isG?(parseInt(((document.getElementById('gs-karat')||{value:'24'}).value))||24):24;
      var val=w*p*(k/24);
      var nW=isG?85:595;var nV=nW*p;
      var met=val>=nV&&val>0;var zakat=met?val*0.025:0;
      // Update all currency symbols in modal
      document.querySelectorAll('#modal-body .inp-pre').forEach(function(el){el.textContent=sym;});
      document.getElementById('gs-total').textContent=sym+' '+val.toFixed(2);
      document.getElementById('gs-nisab').textContent=sym+' '+nV.toFixed(2);
      var ze=document.getElementById('gs-zakat');ze.textContent=sym+' '+zakat.toFixed(2);pulse(ze);
      var box=document.getElementById('gs-nisab-box'),nt=document.getElementById('gs-nt');
      if(met){box.className='nisab-box pass';nt.textContent='Nisab Reached \u2713';}
      else{box.className='nisab-box fail';nt.textContent='Below Nisab';}
    };
    ['gs-weight','gs-price'].forEach(function(id){var e=document.getElementById(id);if(e)e.oninput=_calcMetalFn;});
    var ks=document.getElementById('gs-karat');if(ks)ks.onchange=_calcMetalFn;
    _calcMetalFn(); // run once on open
  } else if(t.type==='crypto'){
    tokCount=3;
    _calcCryptoFn = function(){
      var c=CURR[ACT];var sym=c.sym;var total=0;
      document.querySelectorAll('#tok-container .tok-card').forEach(function(card){
        var id=card.id.replace('tok-card-','');
        var a=parseFloat((document.getElementById('tok-amt-'+id)||{}).value)||0;
        var p=parseFloat((document.getElementById('tok-price-'+id)||{}).value)||0;
        var v=a*p;total+=v;
        var ve=document.getElementById('tok-val-'+id);if(ve)ve.textContent='Value: '+sym+' '+v.toFixed(2);
      });
      document.getElementById('crypto-total').textContent=sym+' '+total.toFixed(2);
      var nisab=(LIVE.silverUSD&&LIVE.silverUSD>0)?(LIVE.silverUSD*595*c.rate):c.nisabS;
      var met=total>=nisab;var zakat=met?total*0.025:0;
      var ze=document.getElementById('crypto-zakat');ze.textContent=sym+' '+zakat.toFixed(2);pulse(ze);
      var box=document.getElementById('crypto-nisab-box'),nt=document.getElementById('crypto-nt');
      if(met){box.className='nisab-box pass';nt.textContent='Nisab Met \u2713';}
      else{box.className='nisab-box fail';nt.textContent='Below Nisab';}
      // Update tok-price label sym
      document.querySelectorAll('#tok-container .tok-curr-sym').forEach(function(el){
        el.textContent=sym;
      });
    };
    for(var i=1;i<=3;i++){
      (function(id){var ae=document.getElementById('tok-amt-'+id);var pe=document.getElementById('tok-price-'+id);if(ae)ae.oninput=_calcCryptoFn;if(pe)pe.oninput=_calcCryptoFn;})(i);
    }
    _calcCryptoFn();
    var ab=document.getElementById('add-tok-btn');
    if(ab)ab.onclick=function(){
      tokCount++;var id=tokCount;
      var c2=CURR[ACT];
      var div=document.createElement('div');
      div.innerHTML=buildTokRow(id,'TOKEN','1');
      document.getElementById('tok-container').appendChild(div.firstChild);
      var ae=document.getElementById('tok-amt-'+id);var pe=document.getElementById('tok-price-'+id);
      if(ae)ae.oninput=window.calcCrypto;if(pe)pe.oninput=window.calcCrypto;
    };
  } else if(document.getElementById('alloc-total')!==null){
    // Allocation planner — wire all inputs
    var allocInputs=['alloc-total'].concat([0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7].map(function(i){return 'alloc-pct-'+i;}));
    allocInputs.forEach(function(id){
      var el=document.getElementById(id);
      if(el)el.addEventListener('input',function(){if(typeof _calcGenericFn==='function')_calcGenericFn();});
    });
    if(typeof _calcGenericFn==='function')_calcGenericFn();
  } else {
    var entCount=1;
    _calcGenericFn = function(){
      var c=CURR[ACT];var sym=c.sym;var total=0;
      // Update all symbol spans
      document.querySelectorAll('#modal-body .inp-pre').forEach(function(el){el.textContent=sym;});
      document.querySelectorAll('.modal-val').forEach(function(e){total+=parseFloat(e.value)||0;});
      var liab=parseFloat((document.getElementById('modal-liab')||{}).value)||0;
      var net=Math.max(0,total-liab);
      var nisab=(LIVE.silverUSD&&LIVE.silverUSD>0)?(LIVE.silverUSD*595*c.rate):c.nisabS;
      var met=net>=nisab;var zakat=met?net*0.025:0;
      var te=document.getElementById('modal-total');var le=document.getElementById('modal-liab-show');
      var ne=document.getElementById('modal-net');var ze=document.getElementById('modal-zakat');
      if(te)te.textContent=sym+' '+total.toFixed(2);
      if(le)le.textContent='-'+sym+' '+liab.toFixed(2);
      if(ne)ne.textContent=sym+' '+net.toFixed(2);
      if(ze){ze.textContent=sym+' '+zakat.toFixed(2);pulse(ze);}
      var box=document.getElementById('modal-nisab-box'),title=document.getElementById('modal-nisab-title');
      if(box&&title){
        if(met){box.className='nisab-box pass';title.textContent='Zakat Eligible \u2713';}
        else{box.className='nisab-box fail';title.textContent='Below Nisab';}
      }
    };
    var fv=document.getElementById('ev-1');if(fv)fv.oninput=_calcGenericFn;
    var ml=document.getElementById('modal-liab');if(ml)ml.oninput=_calcGenericFn;
    var ab=document.getElementById('add-entry-btn');
    if(ab)ab.onclick=function(){
      entCount++;var id=entCount;var c=CURR[ACT];
      var div=document.createElement('div');div.className='entry-row';div.setAttribute('data-eid',id);
      div.innerHTML='<div class="entry-head"><input class="entry-name" type="text" value="Asset '+id+'" id="en-'+id+'"><button class="del-btn">\u2715</button></div>'+
        '<div class="inp-wrap"><span class="inp-pre modal-sym">'+c.sym+'</span><input class="zs-inp modal-val" type="number" id="ev-'+id+'" placeholder="0.00" min="0"></div>';
      document.getElementById('modal-entries').appendChild(div);
      document.getElementById('ev-'+id).oninput=_calcGenericFn;
      div.querySelector('.del-btn').onclick=function(){div.remove();_calcGenericFn();};
    };
  }
}

// ===== LANGUAGE + CURRENCY SWITCHER =====
var ACT = 'USD';
var LIVE = {goldUSD:0,silverUSD:0,btc:0,eth:0,bnb:0,sol:0,xrp:0};
var lastFetch = 0;

function toggleLCPanel(){
  var p=document.getElementById('lc-panel');
  if(!p) return;
  p.classList.toggle('open');
  if(p.classList.contains('open')) buildCurrList('');
}

function switchLCTab(btn, tab){
  document.querySelectorAll('.lc-tab').forEach(function(b){b.classList.remove('active');});
  btn.classList.add('active');
  document.getElementById('lc-curr-tab').style.display = tab==='curr'?'block':'none';
  document.getElementById('lc-lang-tab').style.display = tab==='lang'?'block':'none';
  if(tab==='lang') buildLangList();
  if(tab==='curr') buildCurrList('');
}

function filterCurr(q){
  buildCurrList(q.toLowerCase());
}

function buildCurrList(q){
  var el=document.getElementById('curr-list');
  if(!el) return;
  var groups={
    '\uD83C\uDF0D Popular':['USD','EUR','GBP','PKR','SAR','AED','MYR','INR','TRY','IDR'],
    '\uD83C\uDF19 Gulf & Middle East':['SAR','AED','KWD','QAR','BHD','OMR','JOD','IQD','LYD','MAD','DZD','TND','EGP','AFN','IRR'],
    '\uD83C\uDF0F South & Southeast Asia':['INR','PKR','BDT','MYR','IDR','LKR','NPR','PHP','SGD','THB'],
    '\uD83C\uDF0D Africa':['NGN','EGP','ZAR','KES','GHS','ETB','TZS','SDG','SOS'],
    '\uD83C\uDF10 Europe & Americas':['GBP','EUR','TRY','CHF','CAD','AUD','BRL','MXN','RUB','ILS'],
    '\uD83C\uDF0F Central & East Asia':['KZT','UZS','CNY','JPY','KRW'],
  };
  var seen={};
  var html='';
  Object.keys(groups).forEach(function(grp){
    var items=groups[grp].filter(function(code){
      if(seen[code]) return false;
      if(!CURR[code]) return false;
      if(q){
        var c=CURR[code];
        if(c.code.toLowerCase().indexOf(q)===-1 && c.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(q)===-1) return false;
      }
      seen[code]=true;
      return true;
    });
    if(!items.length) return;
    html+='<div class="lc-group-label">'+grp+'</div>';
    items.forEach(function(code){
      var c=CURR[code];
      var active=ACT===code?'active':'';
      html+='<div class="lc-item '+active+'" onclick="selectCurr(\''+code+'\')">'
        +'<span class="lc-flag">'+c.flag+'</span>'
        +'<span class="lc-name">'+c.name+'<small>'+c.sym+'</small></span>'
        +'<span class="lc-code">'+c.code+'</span>'
        +'</div>';
    });
  });
  // remaining not in any group
  var allHtml='';
  Object.keys(CURR).forEach(function(code){
    if(seen[code]) return;
    if(q){var c=CURR[code];if(c.code.toLowerCase().indexOf(q)===-1 && c.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(q)===-1) return;}
    var c=CURR[code];
    var active=ACT===code?'active':'';
    allHtml+='<div class="lc-item '+active+'" onclick="selectCurr(\''+code+'\')">'
      +'<span class="lc-flag">'+c.flag+'</span>'
      +'<span class="lc-name">'+c.name+'<small>'+c.sym+'</small></span>'
      +'<span class="lc-code">'+c.code+'</span>'
      +'</div>';
  });
  el.innerHTML = html + allHtml;
}

function buildLangList(){
  var el=document.getElementById('lang-list');
  if(!el) return;
  var html='';
  Object.keys(LANGS).forEach(function(code){
    var l=LANGS[code];
    var active=ACT_LANG===code?'active':'';
    html+='<div class="lc-item '+active+'" onclick="selectLang(\''+code+'\')">'
      +'<span class="lc-flag">'+l.flag+'</span>'
      +'<span class="lc-name">'+l.native+'<small>'+l.name+'</small></span>'
      +'<span class="lc-code">'+code.toUpperCase()+'</span>'
      +'</div>';
  });
  el.innerHTML=html;
}

function selectCurr(code){
  setCurrency(code);
  // Update button label
  var c=CURR[code];
  var flagEl=document.getElementById('lc-flag');
  var lblEl=document.getElementById('lc-curr-lbl');
  if(flagEl) flagEl.textContent=c.flag;
  if(lblEl) lblEl.textContent=c.code;
  // Auto switch language if currency has default lang
  if(c.lang && c.lang !== ACT_LANG){
    selectLang(c.lang);
    return; // selectLang will close panel
  }
  closeLCPanel();
}

function selectLang(code){
  if(!LANGS[code]) return;
  ACT_LANG = code;
  var l=LANGS[code];
  // Update button lang label
  var langLbl=document.getElementById('lc-lang-lbl');
  if(langLbl) langLbl.textContent=code.toUpperCase();
  // Apply RTL/LTR
  var docEl = document.documentElement || document.body;
  if(l.dir==='rtl'){
    document.body.classList.add('rtl');
    if(docEl){docEl.setAttribute('dir','rtl');docEl.setAttribute('lang',code);}
  } else {
    document.body.classList.remove('rtl');
    if(docEl){docEl.setAttribute('dir','ltr');docEl.setAttribute('lang',code);}
  }
  // Apply translations
  applyTranslations(code);
  // Also auto-switch currency to match language if user has not manually set one
  var currForLang = Object.keys(CURR).find(function(k){ return CURR[k].lang===code; });
  if(currForLang && ACT==='USD' && code!=='en'){
    selectCurr(currForLang);
    return;
  }
  closeLCPanel();
}

function applyTranslations(lang){
  var tx = T[lang] || T['en'];
  // 1. All data-i18n text elements
  document.querySelectorAll('[data-i18n]').forEach(function(el){
    var key=el.getAttribute('data-i18n');
    if(!tx[key]) return;
    if(el.tagName==='INPUT'||el.tagName==='TEXTAREA'){
      el.placeholder=tx[key]; return;
    }
    if(el.children.length===0){
      el.textContent=tx[key];
    } else {
      // update first text node only (preserve child tags like em, svg)
      for(var i=0;i<el.childNodes.length;i++){
        if(el.childNodes[i].nodeType===3 && el.childNodes[i].textContent.trim()){
          el.childNodes[i].textContent=tx[key]+' '; break;
        }
      }
    }
  });
  // 2. data-i18n-ph = placeholder attributes
  document.querySelectorAll('[data-i18n-ph]').forEach(function(el){
    var key=el.getAttribute('data-i18n-ph');
    if(tx[key]) el.placeholder=tx[key];
  });
  // 3. Tool search placeholder
  var sp=document.getElementById('tool-search');
  if(sp && tx.search_ph) sp.placeholder=tx.search_ph;
  // 4. Re-render tools with translated "Open Calculator" text
  if(tx.open_calc) renderTools();
  // 5. Nisab title text
  var nt=document.getElementById('adv-nisab-title');
  if(nt){
    var isPass=nt.textContent.indexOf('Met')!==-1||nt.textContent.indexOf('\u2713')!==-1||nt.textContent.indexOf('\u0645\u0633\u062A\u0648\u0641')!==-1||nt.textContent.indexOf('\u067E\u0648\u0631\u0627')!==-1;
    nt.textContent=isPass?(tx.above_nisab||'Nisab Met \u2713'):(tx.below_nisab||'Below Nisab Threshold');
  }
  // 6. Filter tabs - translate category labels
  var catMap2={all:'cat_all',Core:'cat_core',Nisab:'cat_nisab',Haul:'cat_haul',Business:'cat_business',
    Crypto:'cat_crypto',Property:'cat_property',Family:'cat_family',Distribution:'cat_dist',
    Advanced:'cat_adv',Reporting:'cat_reporting',Compliance:'cat_compliance',Logic:'cat_logic',
    Consumer:'cat_consumer',Institutional:'cat_institutional',Niche:'cat_niche'};
  document.querySelectorAll('.fbtn').forEach(function(btn){
    var cat=btn.getAttribute('data-cat');
    var key=catMap2[cat];
    if(key&&tx[key]) btn.textContent=tx[key];
  });
  // 6b. Update modal currency bar if open
  var bar=document.getElementById('modal-curr-bar');
  if(bar){
    bar.querySelectorAll('.modal-cpill').forEach(function(p){
      p.classList.toggle('active',p.textContent.indexOf(ACT)>-1);
    });
  }
  // 7. Hero badge fix (has extra space node)
  var badge=document.querySelector('.hero-badge');
  if(badge && tx.hero_badge){
    var dot=badge.querySelector('.badge-dot');
    badge.textContent=' '+tx.hero_badge;
    if(dot && badge.insertBefore) try{badge.insertBefore(dot, badge.firstChild);}catch(e){}
  }
}

function closeLCPanel(){
  var p=document.getElementById('lc-panel');
  if(p) p.classList.remove('open');
}

// Close panel when clicking outside
document.addEventListener('click', function(e){
  var sw=document.getElementById('lc-switcher');
  if(sw && !sw.contains(e.target)) closeLCPanel();
});

// ===== PRICES INIT (WordPress-safe) =====
function zsInit(){
  try{fetchPrices();}catch(e){}
  setInterval(function(){try{fetchPrices();}catch(e){}}, 60000);
  setCurrency('USD');
  renderTools();
  // Init switcher
  buildCurrList('');
  buildLangList();
  // bind filter-tabs and search (WordPress-safe)
  var ft=document.getElementById('filter-tabs');
  if(ft){ft.querySelectorAll('.fbtn').forEach(function(b){
    b.onclick=function(){activeCat=b.getAttribute('data-cat');document.querySelectorAll('.fbtn').forEach(function(x){x.classList.remove('active');});b.classList.add('active');renderTools();};
  });}
  var ts=document.getElementById('tool-search');
  if(ts){ts.oninput=function(){activeSearch=this.value.toLowerCase();renderTools();};}
}
if(document.readyState==='loading'){
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', zsInit);
} else {
  zsInit();
}

function buildModalCurrList(filter){
  var list=document.getElementById('mcd-list');if(!list)return;
  var q=(filter||'').toLowerCase();
  var html='';
  Object.keys(CURR).forEach(function(code){
    var cc=CURR[code];
    if(q && cc.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(q)===-1 && code.toLowerCase().indexOf(q)===-1) return;
    var active=ACT===code?' active':'';
    html+='<div class="mcd-item'+active+'" data-curr="'+code+'">'
      +'<span class="mcd-flag">'+cc.flag+'</span>'
      +'<span>'+code+'</span>'
      +'<span class="mcd-name">'+cc.name+'</span>'
      +'</div>';
  });
  list.innerHTML=html||'<div style="padding:12px;text-align:center;font-size:11px;color:var(--n4)">No results</div>';
  // Attach click events directly (no inline onclick = no quote issues)
  list.querySelectorAll('.mcd-item').forEach(function(el){
    el.addEventListener('click', function(){
      setModalCurr(this.getAttribute('data-curr'));
    });
  });
}
function toggleModalCurrDrop(){
  var drop=document.getElementById('modal-curr-drop');
  var trigger=document.getElementById('modal-curr-trigger');
  if(!drop)return;
  var isOpen=drop.classList.toggle('open');
  trigger.classList.toggle('open',isOpen);
  if(isOpen){
    var inp=document.getElementById('mcd-search');
    if(inp){inp.value='';inp.focus();}
    buildModalCurrList('');
  }
}
function filterModalCurr(val){buildModalCurrList(val);}

document.addEventListener('click',function(e){
  var wrap=document.getElementById('modal-curr-trigger');
  var drop=document.getElementById('modal-curr-drop');
  if(!wrap||!drop)return;
  if(!wrap.contains(e.target)&&!drop.contains(e.target)){
    drop.classList.remove('open');
    wrap.classList.remove('open');
  }
});
